0069:       <!-- IG-38941 Concatinating Special Characters($@#%!_) and substring before it to support scenario like few item without storage location -->
0070:       <!-- and rest have same storage location(SLOC_LEVEL = 'H') and may have string length less than 4 -->
0071:       <!-- Example Item 1 and 4 LGORT is empty and Item 2 and 3 having LGORT as 'CD' -->
0072:       <!-- Even this logic will works for special char storage location like 'ABC$' or '$@#%' which tested via UT -->
0073:       <xsl:variable name="v_lgort_header_temp">
0074:          <xsl:for-each select="E1EDP01">
0075:             <xsl:if test="string-length(LGORT)>0">
0076:                <xsl:value-of select="concat(LGORT,'$@#%!_')"/>
0077:             </xsl:if>
0078:          </xsl:for-each>
0079:       </xsl:variable>
0080:       <xsl:variable name="v_lgort_header" select="substring-before($v_lgort_header_temp,'$@#%!_')"/>

0456:                            </xsl:variable>
0457:                            <xsl:attribute name="pickUpDate">
0458:                               <xsl:if test="(string-length(E1EDK03[IDDAT = '040']/DATUM) > 0)">
0459:                                  <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
0460:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
0461:                                                     select="E1EDK03[IDDAT = '040']/DATUM"/>
0462:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_time"
0463:                                                     select="$v_uzeit"/>
0464:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone"
0465:                                                     select="$anERPTimeZone"/>
0466:                                  </xsl:call-template>
0467:                               </xsl:if>
0468:                            </xsl:attribute>
0469:                         </xsl:if>
0470:                         <xsl:variable name="v_uzeit_hdr">
0471:                            <xsl:choose>
0472:                               <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(E1EDK03[IDDAT = '002']/UZEIT))>0">
0473:                                  <xsl:value-of select="E1EDK03[IDDAT = '002']/UZEIT"/>
0474:                               </xsl:when>
0475:                               <xsl:otherwise>
0476:                                  <xsl:value-of select="'120000'"/>
0477:                               </xsl:otherwise>
0478:                            </xsl:choose>
0479:                         </xsl:variable>
0480:                         <xsl:if test="E1EDK03[IDDAT = '002']">
0481:                            <xsl:attribute name="requestedDeliveryDate">
0482:                               <xsl:if test="(string-length(E1EDK03[IDDAT = '002']/DATUM) > 0)">
0483:                                  <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
0484:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
0485:                                                     select="E1EDK03[IDDAT = '002']/DATUM"/>
0486:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_time"
0487:                                        select="$v_uzeit_hdr"/>
0488:                                     <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone"
0489:                                                     select="$anERPTimeZone"/>
0490:                                  </xsl:call-template>
0491:                               </xsl:if>
0492:                            </xsl:attribute>
0493:                         </xsl:if>
0494:                         <!-- CI-1761 STO Outbound -->
0495:                         <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space(E1EDK01/E1ARBCIG_HDR/STO_OUTBOUND))>0">
0496:                            <xsl:attribute name="isSTOOutbound">
0497:                               <xsl:value-of select="'yes'"/>
0498:                            </xsl:attribute>
0499:                         </xsl:if>  
0500:                         <!-- CI-1761 -->
0501:                         <xsl:variable name="v_sum">
0502:                            <xsl:for-each select="E1EDP01">
0503:                               <xsl:choose>
0504:                                  <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(VPREI))>0">
0505:                                     <value>
0506:                                        <xsl:choose>
0507:                                           <xsl:when test="ACTION = '093'">
0508:                                              <xsl:variable name="v_net_value_93">
0509:                                                 <xsl:value-of select="(-1) * (((((VPREI) div (PEINH)) * (BPUMZ)) div (BPUMN)) * (MENGE))"/>
0510:                                              </xsl:variable>
0511:                                              <xsl:value-of select="format-number(round(100 * $v_net_value_93) div 100, '0.00')"/>
0512:                                           </xsl:when>
0513:                                           <xsl:otherwise>
0514:                                              <xsl:variable name="v_net_value">
0515:                                                 <xsl:value-of select="(((((VPREI) div (PEINH)) * (BPUMZ)) div (BPUMN)) * (MENGE))"/>
0516:                                              </xsl:variable>
0517:                                              <xsl:value-of select="format-number(round(100 * $v_net_value) div 100, '0.00')"/>
0518:                                           </xsl:otherwise>
0519:                                        </xsl:choose>
0520:                                     </value>
0521:                                  </xsl:when>
0522:                                  <xsl:otherwise>
0523:                                     <xsl:value-of select="'0.00'"/>
0524:                                  </xsl:otherwise>
0525:                               </xsl:choose>
0526:                            </xsl:for-each>
0527:                         </xsl:variable>
0528:                         <Total>
0529:                            <Money>
0530:                               <xsl:attribute name="currency">
0531:                                  <xsl:value-of select="E1EDK01/CURCY"/>
0532:                               </xsl:attribute>
0533:                               <xsl:variable name="v_money">
0534:                                  <xsl:value-of select="sum($v_sum/value)"/>
0535:                               </xsl:variable>
0536:                               <xsl:value-of select="format-number(round(100 * $v_money) div 100, '0.00')"/>
0537:                            </Money>
0538:                         </Total>
0539:                         <!-- To support storage location feature at header level and handling regression as well -->
0540:                         <xsl:if test="($v_ship and not(exists(E1EDK01/E1ARBCIG_HDR/SLOC_LEVEL))) or ($v_ship and $v_sloc_level = 'H')">

0547:                                        </xsl:attribute>

0897:                                           <!--*IG-28383{         include International Dialing Code for Telephone/Fax                             -->

0900:                                           </xsl:if>
0901: <!--                                          *}IG-28383                                          -->
0902:                                        </CountryCode>
0903:                                        <AreaOrCityCode/>
0904:                                        <Number>
0905:                                           <xsl:value-of select="E1EDK14[QUALF = '011']/E1ARBCIG_COMPANY_INFO/TEL_NUMBER"/>

0913:                                  </Phone>

1758:                               <xsl:variable name="v_minDate">
1759:                                  <xsl:for-each select="E1EDP20/EDATU">
1760:                                     <xsl:sort select="EDATU" data-type="text"
1761:                                               order="ascending"/>
1762:                                     <xsl:if test="position() = 1">
1763:                                        <xsl:value-of select="."/>
1764:                                     </xsl:if>
1765:                                  </xsl:for-each>
1766:                               </xsl:variable>
1767:                               <xsl:variable name="v_minTime">
1768:                                  <xsl:for-each select="E1EDP20[EDATU = $v_minDate]/EZEIT">
1769:                                     <xsl:sort select="EZEIT" data-type="text" order="ascending"/>
1770:                                     <xsl:if test="position() = 1">
1771:                                        <xsl:value-of select="."/>
1772:                                     </xsl:if>
1773:                                  </xsl:for-each>
1774:                               </xsl:variable>                              
1775:                               <xsl:variable name="v_time">
1776:                                  <xsl:choose>
1777:                                     <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($v_minTime))>0 and ($v_minTime) != '000000'"> 
1778:                                        <xsl:value-of select="$v_minTime"/>
1779:                                     </xsl:when>
1780:                                     <xsl:otherwise>
1781:                                        <xsl:value-of select="'120000'"/>
1782:                                     </xsl:otherwise>
1783:                                  </xsl:choose>
1784:                               </xsl:variable>
1785:                               <xsl:choose>
1786:                                  <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE)) > 0">

1788:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
1789:                                           select="$v_minDate"/>
1790:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_time"
1791:                                           select="$v_time"/>

1793:                                           select="E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE"/>                                       
1794:                                     </xsl:call-template>
1795:                                  </xsl:when>
1796:                                  <xsl:otherwise>

1798:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
1799:                                           select="$v_minDate"/>

1801:                                           select="$v_time"/>

2913:                                     <!--IG-30965 : For more than 4 values of MESBT, the SUM operator rsults a long decimal value. Hence above statement is now formatted as below below -->
2914:                                     <xsl:variable name="v_sum">
2915:                                        <xsl:variable name="v_temp_sum" select="sum(E1EDP04[string-length(normalize-space(MWSBT)) > 0]/MWSBT)"/>
2916:                                              <!-- IG-41595 -->
2917:                                              <xsl:value-of select="format-number($v_temp_sum, '0.00')"/>
2918:                                              <!-- IG-41595 -->
2919:                                     </xsl:variable>
2920:                                     <!--IG-30965 : Format function does not remove the '-' sign if the value is '-0.00'. To avoid any unexpected behaviour, '-0.00' is translated to '0.00'-->
2921:                                     <xsl:choose>
2922:                                        <xsl:when test="$v_sum = '-0.00'">0.00</xsl:when>
2923:                                        <xsl:otherwise>
2924:                                           <xsl:value-of select="$v_sum"/>
2925:                                        </xsl:otherwise>
2926:                                     </xsl:choose>

3149:                                        <xsl:attribute name="identifier">
3150:                                           <xsl:value-of select="E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/MRP_CNTL"/> 
3151:                                        </xsl:attribute>

3154:                                        </xsl:attribute>

3158:                                                 select="$v_vendor/E1ARBCIG_PARTNER_INFO/SPRAS_ISO"/>

3577:                                  </xsl:attribute>

3581:                                           <xsl:value-of select="UZEIT"/>
3582:                                        </xsl:when>
3583:                                        <xsl:otherwise>
3584:                                           <xsl:value-of select="'120000'"/>
3585:                                        </xsl:otherwise>

3589:                                     <xsl:if test="(string-length(normalize-space(EINDT)) > 0)">
3590:                                     <xsl:choose>
3591:                                        <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(../E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE)) > 0">
3592:                                           <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
3593:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_date" select="EINDT"/>
3594:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_time" select="$v_uzeit_sch"/>
3595:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone" select="../E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE"/>
3596:                                           </xsl:call-template>
3597:                                        </xsl:when>
3598:                                        <xsl:otherwise>
3599:                                           <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
3600:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
3601:                                                 select="EINDT"/>
3602:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_time"
3603:                                                 select="$v_uzeit_sch"/>
3604:                                              <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone"
3605:                                                 select="$anERPTimeZone"/>
3606:                                           </xsl:call-template>                                          
3607:                                        </xsl:otherwise>
3608:                                     </xsl:choose>
3609:                                     </xsl:if>
3610:                                  </xsl:attribute>
3611:                                  <xsl:attribute name="lineNumber">
3612:                                     <xsl:value-of select="ETENR"/>
3613:                                  </xsl:attribute>
3614:                                  <xsl:variable name="v_schd">
3615:                                     <xsl:value-of select="ETENR"/>
3616:                                  </xsl:variable>    
3617:                                  <xsl:choose>
3618:                                     <xsl:when test="LPEIN = '2'"><!--Weekly-->                                       
3619:                                        <xsl:attribute name="deliveryWindow" select="'P7D'"/>                                           
3620:                                     </xsl:when>
3621:                                     <xsl:when test="LPEIN = '3'"><!--Monthly-->
3622:                                        <xsl:attribute name="deliveryWindow" select="'P1M'"/>                                                               
3623:                                     </xsl:when>
3624:                                     <!--<xsl:otherwise/>-->
3625:                                  </xsl:choose>
3626:                                  <UnitOfMeasure>
3627:                                     <xsl:call-template name="UOMTemplate_Out">
3628:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_UOMinput"
3629:                                                        select="$v_uom"/>
3630:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_anERPSystemID"
3631:                                                        select="$anERPSystemID"/>
3632:                                        <xsl:with-param name="p_anSupplierANID"
3633:                                                        select="$anSupplierANID"/>
3634:                                     </xsl:call-template>
3635:                                  </UnitOfMeasure>                                 
3636:                                  <xsl:if test="not(../../E1EDK01/ACTION = '03')">
3637:                                     <xsl:for-each select="../E1ARBCIG_PURCH_CSC[SCHED_LINE = $v_schd]">
3638:                                        <SubcontractingComponent>
3639:                                           <xsl:attribute name="quantity">
3640:                                              <xsl:choose>
3641:                                                 <xsl:when test="ENTRY_QUANTITY != ''">
3642:                                                    <xsl:value-of select="ENTRY_QUANTITY"/>
3643:                                                 </xsl:when>
3644:                                                 <xsl:otherwise>0.0</xsl:otherwise>
3645:                                              </xsl:choose>                                             
3646:                                           </xsl:attribute>
3647:                                           <xsl:variable name="v_uzeit_reqDate">
3648:                                              <xsl:choose>
3649:                                                 <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($v_uzeit_sc))>0">
3650:                                                    <xsl:value-of select="$v_uzeit_sc"/>
3651:                                                 </xsl:when>
3652:                                                 <xsl:otherwise>
3653:                                                    <xsl:value-of select="'120000'"/>
3654:                                                 </xsl:otherwise>
3655:                                              </xsl:choose>
3656:                                           </xsl:variable>
3657:                                           <xsl:attribute name="requirementDate">
3658:                                              <xsl:choose>
3659:                                                 <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(../E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE)) > 0">
3660:                                                    <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
3661:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_date" select="REQ_DATE"/>
3662:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_time" select="$v_uzeit_reqDate"/>
3663:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone" select="../E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/PLANT_TIMEZONE"/>
3664:                                                    </xsl:call-template>
3665:                                                 </xsl:when>
3666:                                                 <xsl:otherwise>
3667:                                                    <xsl:if test="(string-length(normalize-space(REQ_DATE)) > 0)">
3668:                                                       <xsl:call-template name="ANDateTime">
3669:                                                          <xsl:with-param name="p_date"
3670:                                                             select="REQ_DATE"/>
3671:                                                          <xsl:with-param name="p_time"
3672:                                                             select="$v_uzeit_reqDate"/>
3673:                                                          <xsl:with-param name="p_timezone"
3674:                                                             select="$anERPTimeZone"/>
3675:                                                       </xsl:call-template>
3676:                                                    </xsl:if>                                                   
3677:                                                 </xsl:otherwise>
3678:                                              </xsl:choose>
3679:                                           </xsl:attribute>
3680:                                           <ComponentID>
3681:                                              <xsl:value-of select="concat(PO_ITEM, '_', SCHED_LINE, '_', COMPONENT_NO)"/>
3682:                                           </ComponentID>
3683:                                           <UnitOfMeasure>
3684:                                              <!-- Start of IG-29155 Add ISO UoM  -->
3685:                                              <xsl:choose>
3686:                                                 <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(ENTRY_UOM_ISO)) &gt; 0">

3688:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_UOMinput"
3689:                                                          select="ENTRY_UOM_ISO"/>

3691:                                                          select="$anERPSystemID"/>
3692:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_anSupplierANID"
3693:                                                          select="$anSupplierANID"/>
3694:                                                    </xsl:call-template>
3695:                                                 </xsl:when>
3696:                                                 <!-- End of IG-29155 Add ISO UoM  -->
3697:                                                 <xsl:otherwise>
3698:                                                    <xsl:call-template name="UOMTemplate_Out">
3699:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_UOMinput"
3700:                                                          select="ENTRY_UOM"/>
3701:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_anERPSystemID"
3702:                                                          select="$anERPSystemID"/>
3703:                                                       <xsl:with-param name="p_anSupplierANID"
3704:                                                          select="$anSupplierANID"/>
3705:                                                    </xsl:call-template>
3706:                                                 </xsl:otherwise>
3707:                                              </xsl:choose>
3708:                                           </UnitOfMeasure>

3710:                                              <xsl:call-template name="FillLangOut">
3711:                                                 <xsl:with-param name="p_spras_iso"
3712:                                                                 select="LANGU_ISO"/>

3714:                                                                 select="LANGU"/>
3715:                                                 <xsl:with-param name="p_lang"
3716:                                                                 select="$v_defaultLang"/>
3717:                                              </xsl:call-template>
3718:                                              <xsl:value-of select="DESCRIPTION"/>
3719:                                           </Description>

3724:                                              </BuyerPartID>

3732:                                           </Batch>

3741:                                           </xsl:when>
3742:                                           <!--<xsl:otherwise/>-->

3756:                            <!-- IG-28159 -->
3757:                            <!-- Aviod ItemOutIndustry tag generation if QM_PROCUREMENT_FLAG or Serial number or QM_CNTRL_KEY  is empty -->
3758:                            <!-- Because Empty ItemOutIndustry Order will cause issue when it is used as a reference in Quality Notification -->
3759:                            <xsl:if test="E1ARBCIG_PURCH_CSC/QM_PROCUREMENT_FLAG = 'X' or E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/XCHPF = 'X' or string-length(normalize-space(E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO[SERNO = 'X'])) > 0
3760:                               or E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/RTCONS = 'X' or E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO/HUFLAG = 'X' or string-length(normalize-space(E1ARBCIG_ASSET_INFO))>0
3761:                               or string-length(normalize-space(E1ARBCIG_PO_ITEMS_INFO[XCHPF = 'X']))>0">
3762:                                <ItemOutIndustry>

3765:                                   </xsl:if>

3768:                                   </xsl:if>

3771:                                        <xsl:attribute name="requiresQualityProcess" select="'yes'"/>                                 
3772:                                        <!--controlCode-->

3777:                                        </IdReference>
3778:                                        </xsl:if>

3852:                                  <xsl:value-of select="E1ARBCIG_SERVICE_INFO[1]/PARENT_LINE"/>
3853:                               </xsl:variable>
3854:                               <xsl:choose>
3855:                                  <!-- If it is a Service Line  -->
3856:                                  <xsl:when test="SGTYP='002'">
3857:                                     <xsl:choose>

3861:                                           </xsl:attribute>
3862:                                        </xsl:when>

3865:                                              <xsl:value-of select="'0.0'"/>
3866:                                           </xsl:attribute>
3867:                                        </xsl:otherwise>
3868:                                     </xsl:choose>
3869:                                  </xsl:when>
3870:                                  <!-- If it is a Outline Info  -->
3871:                                  <xsl:otherwise>
3872:                                     <xsl:attribute name="quantity">
3873:                                        <xsl:value-of select="'1.0'"/>
3874:                                     </xsl:attribute>
3875:                                  </xsl:otherwise>
3876:                               </xsl:choose>
3877:                               <xsl:attribute name="lineNumber">
3878:                                  <xsl:choose>
3879:                                     <!--IG-32446 : Check the length of SrvMapKey along with the First character value-->
3880:                                     <xsl:when test="(string-length($v_srvmapkey) = 10) and (substring($v_srvmapkey,1,1)='5')">
3881:                                        <xsl:value-of select="concat(1,substring($v_srvmapkey,2))"/>
3882:                                     </xsl:when>
3883:                                     <xsl:otherwise>
3884:                                        <xsl:choose>
3885:                                           <!--IG-35917 : Check the length of SrvMapKey along with the Fourth character value not zero-->
3886:                                           <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($v_srvmapkey)) > 5 and substring(normalize-space($v_srvmapkey), 5, 1) = '5' and substring($v_srvmapkey,1,1) = '0'
3887:                                              and substring($v_srvmapkey,4,1) = '0' ">
3888:                                              <xsl:value-of	select="concat(substring($v_srvmapkey,1,4),1,substring($v_srvmapkey,6))"/>
3889:                                           </xsl:when>
3890:                                           <xsl:otherwise>
3891:                                              <xsl:value-of select="$v_srvmapkey"/>
3892:                                           </xsl:otherwise>
3893:                                        </xsl:choose>
3894:                                     </xsl:otherwise>
3895:                                  </xsl:choose>
3896:                               </xsl:attribute>

3898:                                  <xsl:if test="exists(/ARBCIG_ORDERS/IDOC/E1EDP01[POSEX = $v_parentlineno])">
3899:                                     <xsl:value-of select="'X'"/>
3900:                                  </xsl:if>
3901:                               </xsl:variable>
3902:                               <xsl:attribute name="parentLineNumber">
3903:                                  <xsl:choose>
3904:                            <!--Do not convert parentLine if its a main PO Line number-->

3906:                                        <xsl:value-of select="$v_parentlineno"/>
3907:                                     </xsl:when>
3908:                                     <!--IG-32446 : Check the length of SrvMapKey along with the First character value-->

3910:                                              <xsl:value-of
3911:                                                 select="concat(1, substring($v_parentlineno, 2))"/>                                                                                
3912:                                     </xsl:when>
3913:                                     <xsl:otherwise>

3917:                                              and substring($v_parentlineno,4,1) = '0'">

3919:                                           </xsl:when>
3920:                                           <xsl:otherwise>
3921:                                              <xsl:value-of select="$v_parentlineno"/> 
3922:                                           </xsl:otherwise>
3923:                                        </xsl:choose>

4018:                                           <xsl:with-param name="p_anERPSystemID"
4019:                                                           select="$anERPSystemID"/>
4020:                                           <xsl:with-param name="p_anSupplierANID"
4021:                                                           select="$anSupplierANID"/>
4022:                                        </xsl:call-template>
