module: /Users/i320581/Documents/XSPEC_HOME/common/FORMAT_AddOn_0000_cXML_0000.xsl; 3711 lines

0001: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
0002: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:hci="http://sap.com/it/"
0003: 	xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" exclude-result-prefixes="#all" version="2.0">
0004: 	<!--	<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document('ParameterCrossreference.xml')"/>
0005:    <xsl:variable name="UOMLookup" select="document('UOMTemplate.xml')"/>-->
0006: 	<xsl:param name="anCrossRefFlag"/>
0007: 	<xsl:param name="anLookUpFlag"/>
0008: 	<xsl:param name="anUOMFlag"/>
0009: 	<xsl:param name="anLocalTesting"/>
0010: 	<xsl:param name="commentlevel_header" select="'HEADER'"/>
0011: 	<xsl:param name="commentlevel_line" select="'LINE'"/>
0012: 	<xsl:param name="commentlevel_service_line" select="'SERVICE'"/>
0013: 	<!-- Outbound MultiERP template -->
0014: 	<xsl:template name="MultiERPTemplateOut">
0015: 		<xsl:param name="p_anIsMultiERP"/>
0016: 		<xsl:param name="p_anERPSystemID"/>
0017: 		<xsl:if test="upper-case($p_anIsMultiERP) = 'TRUE'">
0018: 			<Credential>
0019: 				<xsl:attribute name="domain">SystemID</xsl:attribute>
0020: 				<Identity>
0021: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_anERPSystemID"/>
0022: 				</Identity>
0023: 			</Credential>
0024: 		</xsl:if>
0025: 	</xsl:template>
0026: 	<!-- UOM Template for inbound CIG to SAP -->
0027: 	<!-- This template will be used to map the lookup value of UOMValues from Ariba against Customer values maintained. -->
0028: 	<!-- Currently used in following XSLTs -->
0029: 	<!-- 	MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ComponentConsumptionRequest_AddOn_0000_ComponentConsumptionRequest.xsl
0030: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ConfirmationRequest_AddOn_0000_OrderConfirmation.xsl
0031: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_FIInvoiceDetailRequest_AddOn_0000_FIInvoice.xsl
0032: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_InvoiceDetailRequest_AddOn_0000_Invoice.xsl
0033: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ProductReplenishmentMessage_AddOn_0000_ProductReplenishmentMessage.xsl
0034: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QualityNotificationRequest_AddOn_0000_QualityIssueNotificationMessage.xsl
0035: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ReceiptRequest_AddOn_0000_ComponentAcknowledgement.xsl
0036: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_SalesOrderRequest_AddOn_0000_ReplenishmentOrderRequest.xsl
0037: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ServiceEntrySheet_AddOn_0000_ServiceSheet.xsl
0038: 			MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ShipNoticeRequest_AddOn_0000_AdvanceShipmentNotice.xsl -->
0039: 	<!-- input: -->
0040: 	<!-- p_UOMinput			=	Input UOM Value from Ariba Network, -->
0041: 	<!-- p_anERPSystemID	=	Input ERP SystemID -->
0042: 	<!-- p_anSupplierANID	=	Input Buyer AribaNetworkID -->
0043: 	<!-- output:	Value of Look up is returned if found , else input value is mapped on to output. -->
0044: 	<xsl:template name="UOMTemplate_In">
0045: 		<xsl:param name="p_UOMinput"/>
0046: 		<xsl:param name="p_anERPSystemID"/>
0047: 		<xsl:param name="p_anSupplierANID"/>
0048: 		<xsl:if test="$p_UOMinput != '' and $anUOMFlag = 'YES'">
0049: 			<!--constructing the UOM string-->
0050: 			<xsl:variable name="v_sysId">
0051: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat('UOM_UOM', '_', $p_anERPSystemID)"/>
0052: 			</xsl:variable>
0053: 			<xsl:variable name="v_pd">
0054: 				<xsl:choose>
0055: 					<xsl:when test="$anLocalTesting ='YES'">
0056: 						<xsl:value-of
0057: 							select="'/Users/i320581/Documents/XSPEC_HOME/XSPEC/common/Buyer/UOM.xml'"/>
0058: 					</xsl:when>
0059: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0060: 						<xsl:value-of
0061: 							select="concat('pd', ':', $p_anSupplierANID, ':', $v_sysId, ':', 'Binary')"/>
0062: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0063: 				</xsl:choose>				
0064: 			</xsl:variable>
0065: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the UOM -->
0066: 			<xsl:variable name="UOMLookup" select="document($v_pd)"/>
0067: 			<xsl:choose>
0068: 				<xsl:when
0069: 					test="string-length($UOMLookup/UOM/ListOfItems/Item[AribaValue = $p_UOMinput]/CustomerValue) &gt; 0">
0070: 					<xsl:value-of
0071: 						select="upper-case($UOMLookup/UOM/ListOfItems/Item[AribaValue = $p_UOMinput]/CustomerValue)"
0072: 					/>
0073: 				</xsl:when>
0074: 				<xsl:otherwise>
0075: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_UOMinput"/>
0076: 				</xsl:otherwise>
0077: 			</xsl:choose>
0078: 		</xsl:if>
0079: 		<!--  To accomodate if anUOMFlag is NO-->
0080: 		<xsl:if test="$p_UOMinput != '' and $anUOMFlag = 'NO'">
0081: 			<xsl:value-of select="$p_UOMinput"/>
0082: 		</xsl:if>
0083: 	</xsl:template>
0084: 	<!-- UOM Template for outbound  SAP to CIG -->
0085: 	<!-- This template will be used to map the customer lookup value maintained against Ariba UOMValues in CIG. -->
0086: 	<!-- Currently used in following XSLTs -->
0087: 	<!-- 	MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_CCInvoice_cXML_0000_InvoiceDetailRequest.xsl
0088: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_MMInvoice_cXML_0000_InvoiceDetailRequest.xsl
0089: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_Order_cXML_0000_OrderRequest.xsl
0090: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ProductActivityMessage_cXML_0000_ProductActivityMessage.xsl
0091: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_PurchaseRequisition_cXML_0000_PurchaseRequisitionRequest.xsl
0092: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QualityInspectionDecisionMsg_cXML_0000_QualityInspectionDecisionRequest.xsl
0093: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QualityInspectionRequest_cXML_0000_QualityInspectionRequest.xsl
0094: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QualityIssueNotificationMessage_cXML_0000_QualityNotificationRequest.xsl
0095: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ReceiptRequest_cXML_0000_ReceiptRequest.xsl
0096: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ScheduleAgreementRelease_cXML_0000_OrderRequest.xsl
0097: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ShipNoticeRequest_cXML_0000_ShipNoticeRequest.xsl 
0098: 			MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ERPServiceEntrySheetRequest_cXML_0000_ServiceEntrySheet.xsl -->
0099: 	<!-- input: -->
0100: 	<!-- p_UOMinput			=	Input UOM Value from ERP, -->
0101: 	<!-- p_anERPSystemID	=	Input ERP SystemID -->
0102: 	<!-- p_anSupplierANID	=	Input Supplier AribaNetworkID -->
0103: 	<!-- output:	Value of Look up is returned if found , else input value is mapped on to output. -->
0104: 	<xsl:template name="UOMTemplate_Out">
0105: 		<xsl:param name="p_UOMinput"/>
0106: 		<xsl:param name="p_anERPSystemID"/>
0107: 		<xsl:param name="p_anSupplierANID"/>
0108: 		<xsl:if test="$p_UOMinput != '' and $anUOMFlag = 'YES'">
0109: 			<!--constructing the UOM string-->
0110: 			<xsl:variable name="v_sysId">
0111: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat('UOM_UOM', '_', $p_anERPSystemID)"/>
0112: 			</xsl:variable>
0113: 			<xsl:variable name="v_pd">
0114: 				<xsl:choose>
0115: 					<xsl:when test="$anLocalTesting ='YES'">
0116: 						<xsl:value-of
0117: 							select="'/Users/i320581/Documents/XSPEC_HOME/XSPEC/common/Buyer/UOM.xml'"/>
0118: 					</xsl:when>
0119: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0120: 						<xsl:value-of
0121: 							select="concat('pd', ':', $p_anSupplierANID, ':', $v_sysId, ':', 'Binary')"/>
0122: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0123: 				</xsl:choose>				
0124: 			</xsl:variable>
0125: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the UOM -->
0126: 			<xsl:variable name="UOMLookup" select="document($v_pd)"/>
0127: 			<xsl:choose>
0128: 				<xsl:when
0129: 					test="string-length($UOMLookup/UOM/ListOfItems/Item[CustomerValue = $p_UOMinput]/AribaValue) &gt; 0">
0130: 					<xsl:value-of
0131: 						select="upper-case($UOMLookup/UOM/ListOfItems/Item[CustomerValue = $p_UOMinput]/AribaValue)"
0132: 					/>
0133: 				</xsl:when>
0134: 				<xsl:otherwise>
0135: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_UOMinput"/>
0136: 				</xsl:otherwise>
0137: 			</xsl:choose>
0138: 		</xsl:if>
0139: 		<!--  To accomodate if anUOMFlag is NO-->
0140: 		<xsl:if test="$p_UOMinput != '' and $anUOMFlag = 'NO'">
0141: 			<xsl:value-of select="$p_UOMinput"/>
0142: 		</xsl:if>
0143: 	</xsl:template>
0144: 	<!--Template for lookup table -->
0145: 	<xsl:template name="LookupTemplate">
0146: 		<xsl:param name="p_anERPSystemID"/>
0147: 		<xsl:param name="p_anSupplierANID"/>
0148: 		<xsl:param name="p_producttype"/>
0149: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0150: 		<xsl:param name="p_lookupname"/>
0151: 		<xsl:param name="p_input"/>
0152: 		<xsl:if test="$p_input != '' and $anLookUpFlag = 'YES'">
0153: 			<xsl:variable name="v_sysId">
0154: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat('LOOKUPTABLE', '_', $p_anERPSystemID)"/>
0155: 			</xsl:variable>
0156: 			<xsl:variable name="v_pd">
0157: 				<xsl:choose>
0158: 					<xsl:when test="$anLocalTesting ='YES'">
0159: 						<xsl:value-of
0160: 							select="'/Users/i320581/Documents/XSPEC_HOME/XSPEC/common/Buyer/LOOKUPTABLE.xml'"/>
0161: 					</xsl:when>
0162: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0163: 						<xsl:value-of
0164: 							select="concat('pd', ':', $p_anSupplierANID, ':', $v_sysId, ':', 'Binary')"/>
0165: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0166: 				</xsl:choose>				
0167: 			</xsl:variable>
0168: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the lookup -->
0169: 			<xsl:variable name="Lookup" select="document($v_pd)"/>
0170: 			<xsl:choose>
0171: 				<xsl:when test="$p_lookupname = 'QuoteRequestMatchingType'">
0172: 					<xsl:if test="string-length($Lookup/LOOKUPTABLE/Parameter[DocumentType = $p_doctype and Name = $p_lookupname and ProductType = $p_producttype]/ListOfItems/Item[Value = $p_input]/Name) &gt; 0">
0173: 						<xsl:value-of select="$Lookup/LOOKUPTABLE/Parameter[DocumentType = $p_doctype and Name = $p_lookupname and ProductType = $p_producttype]/ListOfItems/Item[Value = $p_input]/Name"/>
0174: 					</xsl:if>
0175: 				</xsl:when>
0176: 				<xsl:otherwise>
0177: 					<xsl:if test="string-length($Lookup/LOOKUPTABLE/Parameter[DocumentType = $p_doctype and Name = $p_lookupname and ProductType = $p_producttype]/ListOfItems/Item[Name = $p_input]/Value) &gt; 0">
0178: 						<xsl:value-of select="$Lookup/LOOKUPTABLE/Parameter[DocumentType = $p_doctype and Name = $p_lookupname and ProductType = $p_producttype]/ListOfItems/Item[Name = $p_input]/Value"/>
0179: 					</xsl:if>
0180: 				</xsl:otherwise>
0181: 			</xsl:choose>
0182: 		</xsl:if>
0183: 	</xsl:template>
0184: <!-- create S4 Date/Time to AN cXML Date/Time/Timezone Template -->
0185: <!-- input  Date	: CCYY-MM-DD
0186:             Time	: HH:MM:SS
0187:             Timezone	: +HH:MM
0188:       output     	: CCYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+HH:MM	           
0189: 	-->
0190: 	<xsl:template name="ANDateTime_S4HANA">
0191: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
0192: 		<xsl:param name="p_time"/>
0193: 		<xsl:param name="p_timezone"/>
0194: 		<xsl:choose>
0195: 			<xsl:when test="string-length($p_time) &gt; 0">
0196: 				<xsl:variable name="v_time">
0197: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_time"/>
0198: 				</xsl:variable>
0199: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat($p_date, 'T', $v_time, $p_timezone)"/>
0200: 			</xsl:when>
0201: 			<xsl:otherwise>
0202: 				<xsl:variable name="v_time">
0203: 					<xsl:value-of select="'12:00:00'"/>
0204: 				</xsl:variable>
0205: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat($p_date, 'T', $v_time, $p_timezone)"/>
0206: 			</xsl:otherwise>
0207: 		</xsl:choose>
0208: 	</xsl:template>
0209: 	<!-- AN Date Template -->
0210: 	<xsl:template name="ANDate">
0211: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
0212: 		<xsl:if test="$p_date != ''">
0213: 			<xsl:variable name="v_yyyy">
0214: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_date, 1, 4), '-')"/>
0215: 			</xsl:variable>
0216: 			<xsl:variable name="v_mm">
0217: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_date, 5, 2), '-')"/>
0218: 			</xsl:variable>
0219: 			<xsl:variable name="v_dd">
0220: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring($p_date, 7, 2)"/>
0221: 			</xsl:variable>
0222: 			<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_yyyy, $v_mm, $v_dd)"/>
0223: 		</xsl:if>
0224: 	</xsl:template>
0225: 	<!-- AN DateTime Template -->
0226: 	<xsl:template name="ANDateTime">
0227: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
0228: 		<xsl:param name="p_time"/>
0229: 		<xsl:param name="p_timezone"/>
0230: 		<xsl:if test="$p_date != ''">
0231: 			<xsl:variable name="v_yyyy">
0232: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_date, 1, 4), '-')"/>
0233: 			</xsl:variable>
0234: 			<xsl:variable name="v_mm">
0235: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_date, 5, 2), '-')"/>
0236: 			</xsl:variable>
0237: 			<xsl:variable name="v_dd">
0238: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring($p_date, 7, 2)"/>
0239: 			</xsl:variable>
0240: 			<xsl:variable name="v_date">
0241: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_yyyy, $v_mm, $v_dd)"/>
0242: 			</xsl:variable>
0243: 			<xsl:choose>
0244: 				<xsl:when test="string-length($p_time) &gt; 0">
0245: 					<xsl:variable name="v_hh">
0246: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_time, 1, 2), ':')"/>
0247: 					</xsl:variable>
0248: 					<xsl:variable name="v_min">
0249: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_time, 3, 2), ':')"/>
0250: 					</xsl:variable>
0251: 					<xsl:variable name="v_ss">
0252: 						<xsl:value-of select="substring($p_time, 5, 2)"/>
0253: 					</xsl:variable>
0254: 					<xsl:variable name="v_time">
0255: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_hh, $v_min, $v_ss)"/>
0256: 					</xsl:variable>
0257: 					<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_date, 'T', $v_time, $p_timezone)"/>
0258: 				</xsl:when>
0259: 				<xsl:otherwise>
0260: 					<xsl:variable name="v_tim">
0261: <!--						<xsl:value-of select="current-dateTime()"/>-->
0262: 						<xsl:value-of select="'12:00:00'"/>						
0263: 					</xsl:variable>
0264: 					<xsl:value-of
0265: 						select="concat($v_date, 'T', $v_tim, $p_timezone)"/>
0266: 				</xsl:otherwise>
0267: 			</xsl:choose>
0268: 		</xsl:if>
0269: 	</xsl:template>
0270: 	<!-- S/4 HANA Date Template -->
0271: 	<xsl:template name="S4Date">
0272: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
0273: 		<xsl:if test="$p_date != ''">
0274: 			<xsl:variable name="v_part1">
0275: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring-before($p_date,'/')"/>
0276: 			</xsl:variable>
0277: 			<xsl:variable name="v_mm">
0278: 				<xsl:value-of select="format-number($v_part1,'00')"/>
0279: 			</xsl:variable>
0280: 			<xsl:variable name="v_part2">
0281: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring-after($p_date,'/')"/>
0282: 			</xsl:variable>
0283: 			<xsl:variable name="v_part3">
0284: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring-before($v_part2, '/')"/>
0285: 			</xsl:variable>
0286: 			<xsl:variable name="v_dd">
0287: 				<xsl:value-of select="format-number($v_part3,'00')"/>
0288: 			</xsl:variable>
0289: 			<xsl:variable name="v_part4">
0290: 				<xsl:value-of select="substring-after($v_part2, '/')"/>
0291: 			</xsl:variable>
0292: 			<xsl:variable name="v_yyyy">
0293: 				<xsl:value-of select="format-number($v_part4,'00')"/>
0294: 			</xsl:variable>
0295: 			<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_yyyy, '-' ,$v_mm, '-' , $v_dd)"/>
0296: 		</xsl:if>
0297: 	</xsl:template>
0298: 	<!-- Outbound lang Template -->
0299: 	<xsl:template name="FillLangOut">
0300: 		<xsl:param name="p_spras_iso"/>
0301: 		<xsl:param name="p_spras"/>
0302: 		<xsl:param name="p_lang"/>
0303: 		<xsl:choose>
0304: 			<xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($p_spras_iso)) &gt; 0">
0305: 				<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0306: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_spras_iso"/>
0307: 				</xsl:attribute>
0308: 			</xsl:when>
0309: 			<xsl:otherwise>
0310: 				<xsl:choose>
0311: 					<xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($p_spras)) &gt; 0">
0312: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0313: 							<xsl:value-of select="$p_spras"/>
0314: 						</xsl:attribute>
0315: 					</xsl:when>
0316: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0317: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0318: 							<xsl:value-of select="$p_lang"/>
0319: 						</xsl:attribute>
0320: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0321: 				</xsl:choose>
0322: 			</xsl:otherwise>
0323: 		</xsl:choose>
0324: 	</xsl:template>
0325: 	<!-- ERP DateTime Template -->
0326: 	<xsl:template name="ERPDateTime">
0327: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
0328: 		<xsl:param name="p_timezone"/>
0329: 		<xsl:if test="$p_date != ''">
0330: 			<!--Conver the AN date into SAP system zone-->
0331: 			<xsl:variable name="v_time">
0332: 				<xsl:choose>
0333: 					<!--If TimeZone contains '-' negative sign-->
0334: 					<xsl:when test="substring($p_timezone, 1, 1) = '-'">
0335: 						<xsl:value-of
0336: 							select="concat('-', 'PT', substring($p_timezone, 2, 2), 'H', substring($p_timezone, 5, 2), 'M')"
0337: 						/>
0338: 					</xsl:when>
0339: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0340: 						<xsl:value-of
0341: 							select="concat('PT', substring($p_timezone, 2, 2), 'H', substring($p_timezone, 5, 2), 'M')"
0342: 						/>
0343: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0344: 				</xsl:choose>
0345: 			</xsl:variable>
0346: 			<xsl:variable name="v_erpdatetimezone">
0347: 				<xsl:value-of
0348: 					select="adjust-dateTime-to-timezone($p_date, xs:dayTimeDuration($v_time))"/>
0349: 			</xsl:variable>
0350: 			<xsl:value-of select="$v_erpdatetimezone"/>
0351: 		</xsl:if>
0352: 	</xsl:template>
0353: 	<!-- Template for CIG Add On version check-->
0354: 	<xsl:template name="Check_SupportVersion">
0355: 		<xsl:param name="p_sysversion"/>
0356: 		<xsl:param name="p_suppversion"/>
0357: 		<xsl:variable name="p_versioncheck">
0358: 			<xsl:value-of select="substring($p_sysversion, 9, 2)"/>
0359: 		</xsl:variable>		
0360: 		<xsl:if test="number($p_versioncheck) >= number($p_suppversion)">
0361: 			<xsl:value-of select="'true'"/>
0362: 		</xsl:if>		
0363: 	</xsl:template>
0364: 	<!--  User Defined Template for Inbound Proxy Comment Filling-->
0365: 	<xsl:template name="ExtractComments">
0366: 		<xsl:param name="p_comments"/>
0367: 		<xsl:param name="p_lang"/>
0368: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0369: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0370: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0371: 		<xsl:param name="p_attribute"/>
0372: 		<xsl:param name="p_linenum"/>
0373: 
0374: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0375: 
0376: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0377: 			<!--Calling the removeChild template to exclude the attachments URL if it exists-->
0378: 			<xsl:variable name="v_comments">
0379: 				<xsl:call-template name="removeChild">
0380: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_comment" select="$p_comments"/>
0381: 				</xsl:call-template>
0382: 			</xsl:variable>
0383: 
0384: 			<xsl:variable name="v_SpotQuoteID">
0385: 				<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'SpotQuoteID'">
0386: 					<xsl:if
0387: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/SpotQuoteID))">
0388: 						<xsl:value-of
0389: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/SpotQuoteID"
0390: 						/>
0391: 					</xsl:if>
0392: 				</xsl:if>
0393: 			</xsl:variable>
0394: 
0395: 			<xsl:variable name="v_HeaderTextId">
0396: 				<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'HeaderTextID'">
0397: 					<!--IG-23651-To retrieve only first index Workaround for XSLT error 
0398: 					in case Cross-ref params are duplicate-Only for QuoteRequest params-->
0399: 					<xsl:if
0400: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1]))">
0401: 						<xsl:value-of
0402: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1]"
0403: 						/>
0404: 					</xsl:if>
0405: 				</xsl:if>
0406: 			</xsl:variable>
0407: 
0408: 			<xsl:variable name="v_LineTextId">
0409: 				<!--IG-23651-To retrieve only first index Workaround for XSLT error in case Cross-ref params are duplicate-Only for QuoteRequest params-->
0410: 				<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'LineTextID'">
0411: 					<xsl:if
0412: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1]))">
0413: 						<xsl:value-of
0414: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1]"
0415: 						/>
0416: 					</xsl:if>
0417: 
0418: 				</xsl:if>
0419: 			</xsl:variable>
0420: 
0421: 			<xsl:if test="$v_comments != ''">
0422: 				<xsl:call-template name="SplitComments">
0423: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="normalize-space($v_comments)"/>
0424: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="132.0"/>
0425: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_hdrtextid" select="$v_HeaderTextId"/>
0426: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_linetextid" select="$v_LineTextId"/>
0427: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_linenum" select="$p_linenum"/>
0428: 				</xsl:call-template>
0429: 			</xsl:if>
0430: 
0431: 			<xsl:if test="string-length($v_SpotQuoteID) > 0">
0432: 				<item>
0433: 					<TEXT_ID>
0434: 						<xsl:value-of select="$v_SpotQuoteID"/>
0435: 					</TEXT_ID>
0436: 
0437: 					<TEXT_FORM>*</TEXT_FORM>
0438: 					<TEXT_LINE>
0439: 						<xsl:value-of select="normalize-space($p_comments)"/>
0440: 					</TEXT_LINE>
0441: 				</item>
0442: 			</xsl:if>
0443: 		</xsl:if>
0444: 	</xsl:template>
0445: 	<!--  User Defined Template for Comment Split-->
0446: 	<xsl:template name="SplitComments">
0447: 		<xsl:param name="p_str"/>
0448: 		<xsl:param name="p_strlen"/>
0449: 		<xsl:param name="p_tdformat"/>
0450: 		<xsl:param name="p_hdrtextid"/>
0451: 		<xsl:param name="p_linetextid"/>
0452: 		<xsl:param name="p_linenum"/>
0453: 
0454: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str1" select="substring($p_str, 1, $p_strlen)"/>
0455: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str2" select="substring($p_str, $p_strlen + 1)"/>
0456: 		<xsl:if test="$v_str1">
0457: 			<item>
0458: 				<xsl:if test="string-length($p_hdrtextid) > 0">
0459: 					<TEXT_ID>
0460: 						<xsl:value-of select="$p_hdrtextid"/>
0461: 					</TEXT_ID>
0462: 				</xsl:if>
0463: 				<xsl:if test="string-length($p_linetextid) > 0">
0464: 					<TEXT_ID>
0465: 						<xsl:value-of select="$p_linetextid"/>
0466: 					</TEXT_ID>
0467: 				</xsl:if>
0468: 				<xsl:if test="string-length($p_linenum) > 0">
0469: 					<PO_ITEM>
0470: 						<xsl:value-of select="$p_linenum"/>
0471: 					</PO_ITEM>
0472: 				</xsl:if>
0473: 
0474: 				<TEXT_FORM>*</TEXT_FORM>
0475: 				<TEXT_LINE>
0476: 					<xsl:value-of select="$v_str1"/>
0477: 				</TEXT_LINE>
0478: 			</item>
0479: 		</xsl:if>
0480: 		<xsl:if test="$v_str2">
0481: 			<xsl:call-template name="SplitComments">
0482: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="$v_str2"/>
0483: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="$p_strlen"/>
0484: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_hdrtextid" select="$p_hdrtextid"/>
0485: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_linetextid" select="$p_linetextid"/>
0486: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_linenum" select="$p_linenum"/>
0487: 			</xsl:call-template>
0488: 		</xsl:if>
0489: 	</xsl:template>
0490: 	<!--  User Defined Template for Inbound Proxy Comment Filling-->
0491: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillProxyIn">
0492: 		<xsl:param name="p_comments"/>
0493: 		<xsl:param name="p_lang"/>
0494: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0495: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0496: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0497: 		<xsl:param name="p_shipcontrolid"/>
0498: 		<!--Calling the removeChild template to exclude the attachments URL if it exists-->
0499: 		<xsl:variable name="v_comments">
0500: 			<xsl:call-template name="removeChild">
0501: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_comment" select="$p_comments"/>
0502: 			</xsl:call-template>
0503: 		</xsl:variable>
0504: 		<xsl:if test="$v_comments != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0505: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
0506: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0507: 			<!-- Read TextId from PD -->
0508: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textid">
0509: 				<xsl:choose>
0510: 
0511: 					<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0512: 						<!--IG-23651-To retrieve only first index Workaround for XSLT error 
0513: 						in case Cross-ref params are duplicate-Only for QuoteRequest params-->
0514: 						<xsl:value-of
0515: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1])"
0516: 						/>
0517: 					</xsl:when>
0518: 					<xsl:when test="$p_shipcontrolid = 'ShipControlTextID'">
0519: 						<xsl:if
0520: 							test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ShipControlTextID))">
0521: 							<xsl:value-of
0522: 								select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ShipControlTextID"/>
0523: 						</xsl:if>
0524: 					</xsl:when>
0525: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0526: 						<xsl:value-of
0527: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
0528: 						/>
0529: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0530: 
0531: 				</xsl:choose>
0532: 			</xsl:variable>
0533: 			<xsl:if test="$v_textid != ''">
0534: 				<!--         <AribaComment>-->
0535: 				<Item>
0536: 					<TextID>
0537: 						<xsl:value-of select="$v_textid"/>
0538: 					</TextID>
0539: 					<TextLang>
0540: 						<xsl:value-of select="$p_lang"/>
0541: 					</TextLang>
0542: 					<xsl:if test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0543: 						<ItemNumber>
0544: 							<xsl:value-of select="$p_itemNumber"/>
0545: 						</ItemNumber>
0546: 					</xsl:if>
0547: 					<xsl:call-template name="CommentSplitProxy">
0548: 						<!-- Begin of IG-28081 -->
0549: 						<!-- Below Line is commented, as normalize-space is removing the formatting especially Line feeds
0550: 						    and normalize-space is removed while passing the comments-->
0551: 						<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="$v_comments"/>
0552: 						<!-- End   of IG-28081 -->
0553: 						<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="132.0"/>
0554: 					</xsl:call-template>
0555: 				</Item>
0556: 				<!--</AribaComment>-->
0557: 			</xsl:if>
0558: 		</xsl:if>
0559: 	</xsl:template>
0560: 	<!--  User Defined Template for Comment Split-->
0561: 	<xsl:template name="CommentSplitProxy">
0562: 		<xsl:param name="p_str"/>
0563: 		<xsl:param name="p_strlen"/>
0564: 		<xsl:param name="p_tdformat"/>
0565: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str1" select="substring($p_str, 1, $p_strlen)"/>
0566: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str2" select="substring($p_str, $p_strlen + 1)"/>
0567: 		<xsl:if test="$v_str1">
0568: 			<AribaLine>
0569: 				<TextLine>
0570: 					<xsl:value-of select="$v_str1"/>
0571: 				</TextLine>
0572: 			</AribaLine>
0573: 		</xsl:if>
0574: 		<xsl:if test="$v_str2">
0575: 			<xsl:call-template name="CommentSplitProxy">
0576: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="$v_str2"/>
0577: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="$p_strlen"/>
0578: 			</xsl:call-template>
0579: 		</xsl:if>
0580: 	</xsl:template>
0581: 	<!--  User Defined Template for IDOC Comment Filling-->
0582: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillIdocIn">
0583: 		<xsl:param name="p_comments"/>
0584: 		<xsl:param name="p_lang"/>
0585: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0586: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0587: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0588: 		<!--Calling the removeChild template to exclude the attachments URL if it exists-->
0589: 		<xsl:variable name="v_comments">
0590: 			<xsl:call-template name="removeChild">
0591: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_comment" select="$p_comments"/>
0592: 			</xsl:call-template>
0593: 		</xsl:variable>
0594: 		<xsl:if test="$v_comments != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0595: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
0596: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0597: 			<!-- Read TextId from PD -->
0598: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textid">
0599: 				<xsl:choose>
0600: 					<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0601: 						<xsl:value-of
0602: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1])"
0603: 						/>
0604: 					</xsl:when>
0605: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0606: 						<xsl:value-of
0607: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
0608: 						/>
0609: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0610: 				</xsl:choose>
0611: 			</xsl:variable>
0612: 			<xsl:if test="$v_textid != ''">
0613: 				<!--<ARBCIG_COMMENT SE GMENT="1">-->
0614: 				<TDID>
0615: 					<xsl:value-of select="$v_textid"/>
0616: 				</TDID>
0617: 				<TDSPRAS>
0618: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_lang"/>
0619: 				</TDSPRAS>
0620: 				<TDSPRAS_ISO>
0621: 					<xsl:value-of select="$p_lang"/>
0622: 				</TDSPRAS_ISO>				
0623: 				<xsl:if test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0624: 					<ITEMNUMBER>
0625: 						<xsl:value-of select="$p_itemNumber"/>
0626: 					</ITEMNUMBER>
0627: 				</xsl:if>
0628: 				<xsl:call-template name="CommentSplitIdoc">
0629: 					<!-- Begin of IG-28081 -->
0630: 					<!-- Below Line is commented, as normalize-space is removing the formatting especially Line feeds
0631: 						    and normalize-space is removed while passing the comments-->
0632: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="$v_comments"/>
0633: 					<!-- End of IG-28081 -->
0634: 					<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="132.0"/>
0635: 				</xsl:call-template>
0636: 				<!--</ARBCIG_COMMENT>-->
0637: 			</xsl:if>
0638: 		</xsl:if>
0639: 	</xsl:template>
0640: 	<!--  User Defined Template for IDOC Comment Split-->
0641: 	<xsl:template name="CommentSplitIdoc">
0642: 		<xsl:param name="p_str"/>
0643: 		<xsl:param name="p_strlen"/>
0644: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str1" select="substring($p_str, 1, $p_strlen)"/>
0645: 		<xsl:variable name="v_str2" select="substring($p_str, $p_strlen + 1)"/>
0646: <!--		IG-29477 populate e1arbcig_lines only if sting is having any value to be populated for tdline-->
0647: 		<xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($v_str1)) > 0">			
0648: 			<E1ARBCIG_LINES SEGMENT="1">
0649: 				<TDLINE>
0650: 					<xsl:value-of select="$v_str1"/>
0651: 				</TDLINE>
0652: 			</E1ARBCIG_LINES>
0653: 		</xsl:if>
0654: 		<xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($v_str2)) > 0">	
0655: 			<xsl:call-template name="CommentSplitIdoc">
0656: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_str" select="$v_str2"/>
0657: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_strlen" select="$p_strlen"/>
0658: 			</xsl:call-template>
0659: 		</xsl:if>
0660: 	</xsl:template>
0661: 	<!--  Standard Template for PO IDOC Outbound Comment Fill-->
0662: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillIdocOutPO">
0663: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
0664: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0665: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0666: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0667: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0668: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0669: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textID">
0670: 				<xsl:choose>
0671: 					<xsl:when test="$p_doctype = 'QuoteRequest'">
0672: 						<xsl:choose>
0673: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0674: 								<xsl:value-of
0675: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1])"
0676: 								/>
0677: 							</xsl:when>
0678: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0679: 								<xsl:value-of
0680: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
0681: 								/>
0682: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0683: 						</xsl:choose>
0684: 					</xsl:when>
0685: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0686: 						<xsl:choose>
0687: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0688: 								<xsl:value-of
0689: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDPO)"
0690: 								/>
0691: 							</xsl:when>
0692: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0693: 								<xsl:value-of
0694: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDPO)"
0695: 								/>
0696: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0697: 						</xsl:choose>
0698: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0699: 				</xsl:choose>
0700: 
0701: 			</xsl:variable>
0702: 			<!--			Logic for accomodating Multiple Comments-->
0703: 			<!--			Logic explained here applies for templates CommentsFillIdocOutPO, CommentsFillIdocOut and CommentsFillProxyOut-->
0704: 			<!--			Making use of contains(str1,str2) func to achieve this , true is returned when str2 is present as a subset in str1.-->
0705: 			<!--			Here , $v_textID is CIG Crossref and TDID is payload text id.-->
0706: 			<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment/TDID and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != ''">
0707: 				<!--		    Above If Condition is simplified and one to one TextID check is removed since we need to consider all entries ,
0708: 		                    they are later filtered via for-each statements.-->
0709: 				<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0710: 					<xsl:for-each
0711: 						select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TSSPRAS_ISO">
0712: 						<!--			To Read ISO Code only once , called in loop with position 1. Otherwise value-of select will execute once for each instance of condition met -->
0713: 						<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0714: 							<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0715: 						</xsl:if>
0716: 					</xsl:for-each>
0717: 				</xsl:attribute>
0718: 				<xsl:for-each
0719: 					select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]">
0720: 	
0721: 					<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
0722: 						<xsl:if test="string-length(E1ARBCIG_DESC/TDDESC) > 0">
0723: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ',E1ARBCIG_DESC/TDDESC, ':')"/>
0724: 						</xsl:if>
0725: 					</xsl:variable>
0726: 					<xsl:for-each select="E1EDKT2/TDLINE">
0727: 					<xsl:if test="../../TDID">
0728: 						<xsl:choose>
0729: 							<!--			This is to add space inbetween two comments. Just select first time and select space with next comment for subsequent iterations.-->
0730: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
0731: 								
0732: 								<xsl:choose>
0733: 									<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 0">	
0734: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_desc, .)"/>										
0735: 									</xsl:when>
0736: 									<xsl:otherwise>
0737: <!--									<xsl:value-of select="."/>	-->
0738: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0739: 									</xsl:otherwise>
0740: 								</xsl:choose>
0741: 							</xsl:when>
0742: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0743: 																<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0744: <!--								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', $v_desc, .)"/>-->
0745: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0746: 						</xsl:choose>
0747: 					</xsl:if>
0748: 					</xsl:for-each>
0749: 				</xsl:for-each>
0750: 			</xsl:if>
0751: 			<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment = E1EDPT1">
0752: 				<xsl:if test="$p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != ''">
0753: 					<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0754: 						<xsl:for-each
0755: 							select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TSSPRAS_ISO">
0756: 							<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0757: 								<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0758: 							</xsl:if>
0759: 						</xsl:for-each>
0760: 					</xsl:attribute>
0761: 					<xsl:for-each
0762: 						select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]">
0763: 						<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
0764: 							<xsl:if test="string-length(E1ARBCIG_DESC_ITEM/TDDESC) > 0">							
0765: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ',E1ARBCIG_DESC_ITEM/TDDESC, ':')"/>
0766: 							</xsl:if>
0767: 						</xsl:variable>
0768: 						<xsl:for-each select="E1EDPT2/TDLINE">
0769: 						<xsl:choose>
0770: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
0771: 								<xsl:choose>
0772: 									<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 0">	
0773: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_desc, .)"/>										
0774: 									</xsl:when>
0775: 									<xsl:otherwise>
0776: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0777: <!--									<xsl:value-of select="."/>										-->
0778: 									</xsl:otherwise>
0779: 								</xsl:choose>								
0780: 							</xsl:when>
0781: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0782: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0783: <!--								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', $v_desc, .)"/>-->
0784: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0785: 						</xsl:choose>
0786: 					</xsl:for-each>
0787: 					</xsl:for-each>
0788: 				</xsl:if>
0789: 			</xsl:if>
0790: 			<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment = E1EDCT1">
0791: 				<xsl:if test="$p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != ''">
0792: 					<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0793: 						<xsl:for-each
0794: 							select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TSSPRAS_ISO">
0795: 							<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0796: 								<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0797: 							</xsl:if>
0798: 						</xsl:for-each>
0799: 					</xsl:attribute>
0800: 					<xsl:for-each
0801: 						select="$p_aribaComment[contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]">
0802: 
0803: 						<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
0804: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat('',E1ARBCIG_DESC_SITEM, ':')"/>
0805: 						</xsl:variable>
0806: 						<xsl:for-each select="E1EDCT2/TDLINE">
0807: 						<xsl:choose>
0808: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
0809: 								<xsl:choose>
0810: 									<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 1">	
0811: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_desc, .)"/>										
0812: 									</xsl:when>
0813: 									<xsl:otherwise>
0814: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>										
0815: 									</xsl:otherwise>
0816: 								</xsl:choose>
0817: 								
0818: 
0819: 							</xsl:when>
0820: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0821: 																<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0822: <!--								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', $v_desc, .)"/>-->
0823: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0824: 						</xsl:choose>
0825: 						</xsl:for-each>
0826: 					</xsl:for-each>
0827: 				</xsl:if>
0828: 			</xsl:if>
0829: 		</xsl:if>
0830: 	</xsl:template>
0831: 	<!--  User Defined Template for IDOC Outbound Comment Fill-->
0832: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillIdocOut">
0833: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
0834: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0835: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0836: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0837: 		<xsl:param name="p_trans"/>
0838: 		<xsl:param name="p_attach"/>
0839: 
0840: 		<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0841: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
0842: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0843: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textID">
0844: 				<xsl:choose>
0845: 					<!--This is for MM Invoice Transaction	-->
0846: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'MMInvoice'">
0847: 						<xsl:choose>
0848: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0849: 								<xsl:value-of
0850: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDMM)"
0851: 								/>
0852: 							</xsl:when>
0853: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0854: 								<xsl:value-of
0855: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDMM)"
0856: 								/>
0857: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0858: 						</xsl:choose>
0859: 					</xsl:when>
0860: 					<!--This is for PaymentRemittance Request Transaction	-->
0861: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'PaymentRemittance'">
0862: 						<xsl:choose>
0863: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0864: 								<xsl:value-of
0865: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDPR)"
0866: 								/>
0867: 							</xsl:when>
0868: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0869: 								<xsl:value-of
0870: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDPR)"
0871: 								/>
0872: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0873: 						</xsl:choose>
0874: 					</xsl:when>
0875: 					<xsl:otherwise>
0876: 						<xsl:choose>
0877: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
0878: 								<xsl:value-of
0879: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1])"
0880: 								/>
0881: 							</xsl:when>
0882: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0883: 								<xsl:value-of
0884: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
0885: 								/>
0886: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0887: 						</xsl:choose>
0888: 					</xsl:otherwise>
0889: 				</xsl:choose>
0890: 			</xsl:variable>
0891: 			<!-- Filter the HeaderTextID from PD values -->
0892: 			<!-- Filter the HeaderTextID from PD values -->
0893: 			<xsl:if test="$p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != ''">
0894: 				<xsl:choose>
0895: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'PaymentRemittance'">
0896: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0897: 							<xsl:value-of select="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber) and TextID = $v_textID]/TextLang"/>
0898: 							<xsl:for-each
0899: 								select="$p_aribaComment[not(ITEMNUMBER) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TDSPRAS">
0900: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0901: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0902: 								</xsl:if>
0903: 							</xsl:for-each>
0904: 						</xsl:attribute>
0905: 					</xsl:when>
0906: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'MMInvoice'">
0907: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0908: 							<xsl:value-of select="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber) and TextID = $v_textID]/TextLang"/>
0909: 							<xsl:for-each
0910: 								select="$p_aribaComment[not(ITEMNUMBER) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TDSPRAS_ISO">
0911: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0912: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0913: 								</xsl:if>
0914: 							</xsl:for-each>
0915: 						</xsl:attribute>
0916: 					</xsl:when>
0917: 					<xsl:otherwise></xsl:otherwise>
0918: 				</xsl:choose>
0919: 				<xsl:for-each
0920: 					select="$p_aribaComment[not(ITEMNUMBER) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]">
0921: 					<xsl:for-each select="E1ARBCIG_LINES/TDLINE">
0922: 						<xsl:choose>
0923: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
0924: 								<xsl:choose>
0925: 									<xsl:when test="string-length(../../TDDESC) > 0">	
0926: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', ../../TDDESC, ':', .)"/>										
0927: 									</xsl:when>
0928: 									<xsl:otherwise>
0929: 										<xsl:value-of select="."/>										
0930: 									</xsl:otherwise>
0931: 								</xsl:choose>
0932: 							</xsl:when>
0933: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0934: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0935: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0936: 						</xsl:choose>
0937: 					</xsl:for-each>
0938: 				</xsl:for-each>
0939: 			</xsl:if>
0940: 			<!-- Filter the LineTextID from PD values -->
0941: 			<xsl:if
0942: 				test="$p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber] and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != ''">
0943: 				<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
0944: 					<xsl:for-each
0945: 						select="$p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]/TDSPRAS_ISO">
0946: 						<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
0947: 							<xsl:value-of select="."/>
0948: 						</xsl:if>
0949: 					</xsl:for-each>
0950: 				</xsl:attribute>
0951: 				<xsl:for-each
0952: 					select="$p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TDID))]">
0953: 					<xsl:for-each select="E1ARBCIG_LINES/TDLINE">
0954: 						<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
0955: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat(normalize-space(../../TDDESC), ':')"/>
0956: 						</xsl:variable>
0957: 						<xsl:choose>
0958: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
0959: 								<xsl:choose>
0960: 									<xsl:when test="string-length(../../TDDESC) > 0">	
0961: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', ../../TDDESC, ':', .)"/>
0962: 									</xsl:when>
0963: 									<xsl:otherwise>
0964: 										<xsl:value-of select="."/>										
0965: 									</xsl:otherwise>
0966: 								</xsl:choose>
0967: 							</xsl:when>
0968: 							<xsl:otherwise>
0969: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
0970: 							</xsl:otherwise>
0971: 						</xsl:choose>
0972: 					</xsl:for-each>
0973: 				</xsl:for-each>
0974: 			</xsl:if>
0975: 		</xsl:if>
0976: 	</xsl:template>
0977: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillProxyOut">
0978: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
0979: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
0980: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
0981: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
0982: 		<xsl:param name="p_trans"/>
0983: 	    <!--	Begin of IG-19747	-->    
0984:             <!--	    <xsl:template name="CommentsFillProxyOut">-->
0985: 	        <!-- Map multiple comments to cXML  -->
0986: 	        <!-- Takes all the comments and create as many <Comments>  -->
0987:             <!--	         input      p_aribaComment	       : Comments as provided       -->
0988:             <!--			            p_itemNumber             : Line Number                -->
0989:             <!--			            p_doctype                : Target Document Type       -->
0990:             <!--			            p_pd                     : Cross Reference Parameter  -->
0991:             <!--			            p_tran  s                : Transaction name           -->
0992:              <!--           output                    	       : cXML message with <Comments> and Attribute xml:lang along with language			-->
0993:          <!--	End of IG-19747    -->
0994: 		<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
0995: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
0996: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
0997: 			<!-- Read TextId from PD -->
0998: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textID">
0999: 				<xsl:choose>
1000: 					<!--This is for Dispatch Delivery notification Transaction	-->
1001: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'DDN'">
1002: 						<xsl:choose>
1003: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
1004: 								<xsl:value-of
1005: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDDDN)"
1006: 								/>
1007: 							</xsl:when>
1008: 							<xsl:otherwise>
1009: 								<xsl:value-of
1010: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDDDN)"
1011: 								/>
1012: 							</xsl:otherwise>
1013: 						</xsl:choose>
1014: 					</xsl:when>
1015: 					<!--This is for Invoice Status Update Transaction	-->
1016: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'ISU'">
1017: 						<xsl:choose>
1018: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
1019: 								<xsl:value-of
1020: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDISU)"
1021: 								/>
1022: 							</xsl:when>
1023: 							<xsl:otherwise>
1024: 								<xsl:value-of
1025: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDISU)"
1026: 								/>
1027: 							</xsl:otherwise>
1028: 						</xsl:choose>
1029: 					</xsl:when>
1030: 					<xsl:otherwise>
1031: 						<xsl:choose>
1032: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
1033: 								<xsl:value-of
1034: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID[1])"
1035: 								/>
1036: 							</xsl:when>
1037: 							<xsl:otherwise>
1038: 								<xsl:value-of
1039: 									select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
1040: 								/>
1041: 							</xsl:otherwise>
1042: 						</xsl:choose>
1043: 					</xsl:otherwise>
1044: 				</xsl:choose>
1045: 			</xsl:variable>
1046: 		    <!--		Begin of IG-19747 Changes	-->
1047: 		    <!--Get the Default Language -\\->-->
1048: 		    <xsl:variable name="v_lang">
1049: 		        <xsl:call-template name="FillDefaultLang">
1050: 		            <xsl:with-param name="p_doctype" select="$p_doctype"/>
1051: 		            <xsl:with-param name="p_pd" select="$p_pd"/>
1052: 		        </xsl:call-template>
1053: 		    </xsl:variable>			
1054: 		    <!--		End of IG-19747 Changes	-->
1055: 			<!-- Filter the HeaderTextID from PD values -->
1056: 			<xsl:if
1057: 				test="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber)] and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != ''">
1058: 			    <!--	Begin of IG-19747	-->
1059: 			    <xsl:variable name="v_lan">
1060: 			        <xsl:value-of select="$p_aribaComment/Item/TextLang"/>
1061: 			    </xsl:variable>	
1062: 			    <xsl:choose>
1063: 			        <xsl:when test="$v_lan = ''">
1064: 			            <xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
1065: 			                <xsl:for-each
1066: 			                    select="$p_aribaComment/Item and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))">
1067: 			                    <xsl:if test="position() = 1">
1068: 			                        <xsl:choose>
1069: 			                            <xsl:when test="$v_lang !=''">
1070: 			                                <xsl:value-of select="$v_lang"/>
1071: 			                            </xsl:when>
1072: 			                            <xsl:otherwise>
1073: 			                                <xsl:value-of select="'en'"/>
1074: 			                            </xsl:otherwise>
1075: 			                        </xsl:choose>
1076: 			                    </xsl:if>	
1077: 			                </xsl:for-each>	
1078: 			            </xsl:attribute>		
1079: 			        </xsl:when>
1080: 			        <xsl:otherwise>
1081: 			      <!--	End of Changes IG-19747		-->
1082: 				<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
1083: 					<xsl:for-each
1084: 						select="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
1085: 						<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
1086: 							<xsl:value-of select="."/>
1087: 						</xsl:if>
1088: 					</xsl:for-each>
1089: 				</xsl:attribute>
1090: 			    <!--     Begin of IG-19747  -->
1091: 			        </xsl:otherwise>	
1092: 			    </xsl:choose>	
1093: 			    <!-- 	End of IG-19747	-->	      
1094: 				<xsl:for-each
1095: 					select="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
1096: 					<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
1097: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(TextDesc, ':')"/>
1098: 					</xsl:variable>
1099: 					<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine/TextLine">
1100: 						<xsl:choose>
1101: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
1102: 								<xsl:choose>
1103: 									<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 1">	
1104: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', $v_desc, .)"/>										
1105: 									</xsl:when>
1106: 									<xsl:otherwise>
1107: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
1108: 									</xsl:otherwise>
1109: 								</xsl:choose>
1110: 							</xsl:when>
1111: 							<xsl:otherwise>
1112: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
1113: 							</xsl:otherwise>
1114: 						</xsl:choose>
1115: 					</xsl:for-each>
1116: 				</xsl:for-each>
1117: 			</xsl:if>
1118: 			<!-- Filter the LineTextID from PD values -->
1119: 			<xsl:if
1120: 				test="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber] and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != ''">
1121: 			    <!--	Begin of IG-19747	-->
1122: 			    <xsl:variable name="v_language">
1123: 			        <xsl:for-each
1124: 			            select="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
1125: 			            <xsl:if test="position() = 1">
1126: 			                <xsl:value-of select="."/>
1127: 			            </xsl:if>
1128: 			        </xsl:for-each>
1129: 			    </xsl:variable>
1130: 			    <xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
1131: 			        <xsl:choose>
1132: 			            <xsl:when test="string-length($v_language) > 0">
1133: 			                <xsl:value-of select="$v_language"/>
1134: 			            </xsl:when>
1135: 			            <xsl:when test="string-length($v_lang) > 0">
1136: 			                <xsl:value-of select="$v_lang"/>
1137: 			            </xsl:when>
1138: 			            <xsl:otherwise>
1139: 			                <xsl:value-of select="'en'"/>
1140: 			            </xsl:otherwise>
1141: 			        </xsl:choose>
1142: 			    </xsl:attribute>
1143: 			    <!--	End of IG-19747	-->
1144: 				<xsl:for-each
1145: 					select="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
1146: 					<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
1147: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(TextDesc, ':')"/>
1148: 					</xsl:variable>
1149: 					<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine/TextLine">
1150: 						<xsl:choose>
1151: 							<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
1152: 								<xsl:choose>
1153: 									<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 1">	
1154: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', $v_desc, .)"/>										
1155: 									</xsl:when>
1156: 									<xsl:otherwise>
1157: 										<xsl:value-of select="(.)"/>	
1158: 									</xsl:otherwise>
1159: 								</xsl:choose>
1160: 							</xsl:when>
1161: 							<xsl:otherwise>
1162: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)"/>
1163: 							</xsl:otherwise>
1164: 						</xsl:choose>
