1169: 	</xsl:template>
1170: 	<!--Variable to identify the systemID-->
1171: 	<xsl:template name="MultiErpSysIdIN">
1172: 		<xsl:param name="p_ansysid"/>
1173: 		<xsl:param name="p_erpsysid"/>
1174: 		<xsl:choose>
1175: 			<xsl:when test="$p_erpsysid != ''">
1176: 				<xsl:value-of select="$p_erpsysid"/>
1177: 			</xsl:when>
1178: 			<xsl:otherwise>
1179: 				<xsl:value-of select="$p_ansysid"/>
1180: 			</xsl:otherwise>
1181: 		</xsl:choose>
1182: 	</xsl:template>
1183: 	<!--Fill the PORT information from CrossRef-->
1184: 	<xsl:template name="FillPort">
1185: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1186: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1187: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1188: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
1189: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1190: 			<!-- Read Port from PD -->
1191: 			<xsl:value-of
1192: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/PortName)"
1193: 			/>
1194: 		</xsl:if>
1195: 	</xsl:template>
1196: 	<!--Prepare the CrossRef path-->
1197: 	<xsl:template name="PrepareCrossref">
1198: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1199: 		<xsl:param name="p_erpsysid"/>
1200: 		<xsl:param name="p_ansupplierid"/>
1201: 		<!--constructing the crossreference string-->
1202: 		<xsl:variable name="v_crossref">
1203: 			<!--<xsl:value-of select="concat('CROSSREFERENCE', '_', $p_erpsysid, '_', $p_doctype)"/>-->
1204: 			<!-- CROSSREFERENCE_SYSTEMID_DOCTYPE file name changed to CROSSREFERENCE_SYSTEMID for September Release-->
1205: 			<xsl:value-of select="concat('CROSSREFERENCE', '_', $p_erpsysid)"/>
1206: 		</xsl:variable>
1207: 		<xsl:choose>
1208: 			<xsl:when test="$anLocalTesting ='YES'">
1209: 				<xsl:value-of
1210: 					select="'/Users/i320581/Documents/XSPEC_HOME/XSPEC/common/Buyer/ParameterCrossReference.xml'"/>
1211: 			</xsl:when>
1212: 			<xsl:otherwise>
1213: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat('pd', ':', $p_ansupplierid, ':', $v_crossref, ':', 'Binary')"/>
1214: 			</xsl:otherwise>
1215: 		</xsl:choose>		
1216: 	</xsl:template>
1217: 	<!--    Get the Default Language -->
1218: 	<xsl:template name="FillDefaultLang">
1219: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1220: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1221: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1222: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
1223: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1224: 			<!-- Read Default Language from PD -->
1225: 			<xsl:choose>
1226: 				<xsl:when test="normalize-space($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DefaultLang)!=''">
1227: 					<xsl:value-of
1228: 						select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DefaultLang)"
1229: 					/>					
1230: 				</xsl:when>
1231: 				<xsl:otherwise>en</xsl:otherwise>
1232: 			</xsl:choose>
1233: 		</xsl:if>
1234: 	</xsl:template>
1235: 	<!--    Get the IsLogicalSystemEnabled infor -->
1236: 	<xsl:template name="LogicalSystemEnabled">
1237: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1238: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1239: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1240: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
1241: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1242: 			<!-- Read Default Language from PD -->
1243: 			<xsl:value-of
1244: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LSEnabled)"
1245: 			/>
1246: 		</xsl:if>
1247: 	</xsl:template>
1248: 	<!--	 IG-41238 start-->
1249: 	<!--    Get the BuyingandInvoicingEnabled infor -->
1250: 	<xsl:template name="BuyingandInvoicingEnabled">
1251: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1252: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1253: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1254: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
1255: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1256: 			<!-- Read B&I enabled from PD -->
1257: 			<xsl:value-of
1258: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/BuyingandInvoicingEnabled)"
1259: 			/>
1260: 		</xsl:if>
1261: 	</xsl:template>
1262: 	<!--	 IG-41238 end-->
1263: 	<!--Inbound attachment for IDOC -->
1264: 	<xsl:template name="InboundAttachIDOC">
1265: 		<!-- InboundAttachIDOC  -->
1266: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment details from the cXML and create the attachment segment in the IDOC.  -->
1267: 		<!-- input  lineReference    : Line Level Content ID from the cXML message under <Attachment><URL>
1268: 			                         : along with Line Number for Line Level Attachment.If lineReference has 
1269: 			                         : no value, then the attachment is for header. The Attachment content 
1270: 			                         : will be split after 1000 characters. 
1271: 			                          
1272:              output              	 : IDOC attachment segment <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> 
1273:              _____________________________________________________________________________________________
1274: 		     template used by        : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_PayMeNowRequest_AddOn_0000_PayMeNow.xsl        -->
1275: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
1276: 		<xsl:variable name="eachAtt" select="AttachmentList/Attachment"/>
1277: 		<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1278: 			<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1279: 			<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
1280: 				<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
1281: 				<FILENAME>
1282: 					<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentName"/>
1283: 				</FILENAME>
1284: 				<CONTENTTYPE>
1285: 					<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentType"/>
1286: 				</CONTENTTYPE>
1287: 				<CONTENTID>
1288: 					<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1289: 				</CONTENTID>
1290: 				<LINENUMBER>
1291: 					<xsl:call-template name="getAttLineNo">
1292: 						<xsl:with-param name="line" select="$lineReference"/>
1293: 						<xsl:with-param name="contentID" select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1294: 					</xsl:call-template>
1295: 				</LINENUMBER>
1296: 				<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContent">
1297: 					<xsl:with-param name="content" select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentContent"/>
1298: 				</xsl:call-template>
1299: 			</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
1300: 		</xsl:for-each>
1301: 	</xsl:template>
1302: 	<!--Inbound attachment for Proxy -->
1303: 	<xsl:template name="InboundAttach">
1304: 		<!-- InboundAttach  -->
1305: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment details from the cXML and create the attachment segment in the proxy.  -->
1306: 		<!-- input lineReference     : Line Level Content ID from the cXML message under <Attachment><URL>
1307: 			                         : along with Line Number for line level attachment. 
1308:              output              	 : proxy attachment segment <Attachment>
1309:              ______________________________________________________________________________________________
1310:              template called by      : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ComponentConsumptionRequest_AddOn_0000_ComponentConsumptionRequest.xsl
1311:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_FIInvoiceDetailRequest_AddOn_0000_FIInvoice.xsl
1312:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_LiabilityRequest_AddOn_0000_LiabilityTransfer.xsl
1313:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_OrderConfirmationApprovalRequest_AddOn_0000_OrderConfirmationApprovalRequest.xsl
1314:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_PaymentRemittance_AddOn_0000_RemittanceAdvice.xsl
1315:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ProductReplenishmentMessage_AddOn_0000_ProductReplenishmentMessage.xsl
1316:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QualityNotificationRequest_AddOn_0000_QualityIssueNotificationMessage.xsl
1317:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ReceiptRequest_AddOn_0000_ComponentAcknowledgement.xsl
1318:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ServiceEntrySheet_AddOn_0000_ServiceSheet.xsl
1319: 		-->
1320: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
1321: 		<xsl:variable name="eachAtt" select="AttachmentList/Attachment"/>
1322: 		<xsl:if test="$eachAtt">
1323: 			<Attachment>
1324: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1325: 					<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1326: 					<Item>
1327: 						<FileName>
1328: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentName"/>
1329: 						</FileName>
1330: 						<ContentType>
1331: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentType"/>
1332: 						</ContentType>
1333: 						<ContentId>
1334: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1335: 						</ContentId>
1336: 						<LineNumber>
1337: 							<xsl:call-template name="getAttLineNo">
1338: 								<xsl:with-param name="line" select="$lineReference"/>
1339: 								<xsl:with-param name="contentID"
1340: 									select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1341: 							</xsl:call-template>
1342: 						</LineNumber>
1343: 						<Content>
1344: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentContent"/>
1345: 						</Content>
1346: 					</Item>
1347: 				</xsl:for-each>
1348: 			</Attachment>
1349: 		</xsl:if>
1350: 	</xsl:template>
1351: 	<!--New Inbound attachment for Souring Proxy where few proxy structures are generated with 'Attachments' node-->
1352: 	<xsl:template name="InboundAttachs">
1353: 		<!-- InboundAttachs  -->
1354: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment details from the cXML and create the attachment segment in the proxy.  -->
1355: 		<!-- input  lineReference    : Line Level Content ID from the cXML message under <Attachment><URL>
1356: 			                         : along with Line Number.
1357: 			                         : 
1358:              output              	 : proxy attachment segment <Attachments>
1359:              _____________________________________________________________________________________________
1360:              template used by        : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ContractRequest_AddOn_0000_ContractRequest.xsl
1361:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_PaymentReceiptConfirmationRequest_AddOn_0000_PaymentReceiptConfirmationRequest.xsl
1362:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QualityInspectionResultRequest_AddOn_0000_QualityInspectionResultRequest.xsl
1363:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QuoteMessageContract_AddOn_0000_QuoteMessageContract.xsl
1364:                                        MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_SalesOrderRequest_AddOn_0000_ReplenishmentOrderRequest.xsl
1365: 		-->
1366: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
1367: 		<xsl:variable name="eachAtt" select="AttachmentList/Attachment"/>
1368: 		<xsl:if test="$eachAtt">
1369: 			<Attachments>
1370: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1371: 					<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1372: 					<Item>
1373: 						<FileName>
1374: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentName"/>
1375: 						</FileName>
1376: 						<ContentType>
1377: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentType"/>
1378: 						</ContentType>
1379: 						<ContentId>
1380: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1381: 						</ContentId>
1382: 						<LineNumber>
1383: 							<xsl:call-template name="getAttLineNo">
1384: 								<xsl:with-param name="line" select="$lineReference"/>
1385: 								<xsl:with-param name="contentID"
1386: 									select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1387: 							</xsl:call-template>
1388: 						</LineNumber>
1389: 						<Content>
1390: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentContent"/>
1391: 						</Content>
1392: 					</Item>
1393: 				</xsl:for-each>
1394: 			</Attachments>
1395: 		</xsl:if>
1396: 	</xsl:template>
1397: 
1398: 	<xsl:template name="InboundAttachsn0">
1399: 		<!-- InboundAttachn0  -->
1400: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment details from the cXML and create the attachment segment in the proxy.  -->
1401: 		<!-- input  lineReference    : Line Level Content ID from the cXML message under <Attachment><URL>
1402: 			                         : along with Line Number. This is used by ARBCI2 - EHP4 interfaces  
1403:              output              	 : proxy attachment segment <n0:Attachments> with a namespace n0 
1404:              ___________________________________________________________________________________________________
1405: 		     template used by        : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ContractRequestServices_AddOn_0000_ContractRequestServices.xsl
1406: 		                               MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QuoteMessageContractServices_AddOn_0000_PurchasingContractERPRequest.xsl
1407: 		                               MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_QuoteMessageSchedulingAgreement_AddOn_0000_QuoteMessageSchedulingAgreement.xsl
1408: 		                               MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_SchedulingAgreement_AddOn_0000_SchedulingAgreement.xsl
1409: 
1410: 		-->
1411: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
1412: 		<xsl:variable name="eachAtt" select="AttachmentList/Attachment"/>
1413: 		<xsl:if test="$eachAtt">
1414: 			<n0:Attachments xmlns:n0="http://sap.com/xi/ARBCIG2">
1415: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1416: 					<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1417: 					<Item>
1418: 						<FileName>
1419: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentName"/>
1420: 						</FileName>
1421: 						<ContentType>
1422: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentType"/>
1423: 						</ContentType>
1424: 						<ContentId>
1425: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1426: 						</ContentId>
1427: 						<LineNumber>
1428: 							<xsl:call-template name="getAttLineNo">
1429: 								<xsl:with-param name="line" select="$lineReference"/>
1430: 								<xsl:with-param name="contentID"
1431: 									select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentID"/>
1432: 							</xsl:call-template>
1433: 						</LineNumber>
1434: 						<Content>
1435: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/AttachmentContent"/>
1436: 						</Content>
1437: 					</Item>
1438: 				</xsl:for-each>
1439: 			</n0:Attachments>
1440: 		</xsl:if>
1441: 	</xsl:template>
1442: 	<xsl:template name="getAttLineNo">
1443: 		<!-- getAttLineNo  -->
1444: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment details of the line level from the cXML and gets the line number of.  -->
1445: 		<!-- each attachment. The line numbers and line attachments are sent together in contentID variable.-->		
1446: 		<!-- input  line	         : Line Number from cXML
1447: 			        contentID        : Line Level Content ID from the cXML message under <Attachment><URL>
1448: 			                         : along with Line Number  
1449:              output              	 : Line Number of each attachment -->
1450: 		<xsl:param name="line"/>
1451: 		<xsl:param name="contentID"/>
1452: 		<xsl:variable name="cid" select="concat('cid:', normalize-space($contentID))"/>
1453: 		<xsl:for-each select="$line">
1454: 			<xsl:variable name="ind" select="position()"/>
1455: 			<xsl:if test=". = $cid">
1456: 				<!-- Get the previous value -->
1457: 				<xsl:value-of select="$line[$ind - 1]"/>
1458: 			</xsl:if>
1459: 		</xsl:for-each>
1460: 	</xsl:template>
1461: 	<xsl:template name="splitAttContent">
1462: 		<xsl:param name="content"/>
1463: 		<xsl:variable name="line-length" select="1000"/>
1464: 		<xsl:variable name="line" select="substring($content, 1, $line-length)"/>
1465: 		<xsl:variable name="rest" select="substring($content, $line-length + 1)"/>
1466: 		<xsl:if test="$line">
1467: 			<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET>
1468: 				<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
1469: 				<CONTENT>
1470: 					<xsl:value-of select="$line"/>
1471: 				</CONTENT>
1472: 			</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET>
1473: 		</xsl:if>
1474: 		<xsl:if test="$rest">
1475: 			<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContent">
1476: 				<xsl:with-param name="content" select="$rest"/>
1477: 			</xsl:call-template>
1478: 		</xsl:if>
1479: 	</xsl:template>
1480: 	<!--Outbound attachment for Proxy -->
1481: 	<xsl:template name="OutBoundAttach">
1482: 		<xsl:variable name="eachAtt" select="Attachments/Item | Attachment/Item"/>
1483: 		<xsl:if test="$eachAtt">
1484: 			<AttachmentList>
1485: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1486: 					<Attachment>
1487: 						<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1488: 						<AttachmentType>
1489: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/ContentType"/>
1490: 						</AttachmentType>
1491: 						<AttachmentName>
1492: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/FileName"/>
1493: 						</AttachmentName>
1494: 						<AttachmentID>
1495: 							<xsl:value-of select="normalize-space($eachAtt[$count]/ContentId)"/>
1496: 						</AttachmentID>
1497: 						<AttachmentContent>
1498: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/Content"/>
1499: 						</AttachmentContent>
1500: 					</Attachment>
1501: 				</xsl:for-each>
1502: 			</AttachmentList>
1503: 		</xsl:if>
1504: 	</xsl:template>
1505: 	<!--Outbound attachment for IDOC -->
1506: 	<xsl:template name="OutBoundAttachIDOC">
1507: 		<xsl:param name="eachAtt"/>
1508: 		<xsl:if test="$eachAtt">
1509: 			<AttachmentList>
1510: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt">
1511: 					<xsl:variable name="count" select="position()"/>
1512: 					<Attachment>
1513: 						<AttachmentName>
1514: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/FILENAME"/>
1515: 						</AttachmentName>
1516: 						<AttachmentType>
1517: 							<xsl:value-of select="$eachAtt[$count]/CONTENTTYPE"/>
1518: 						</AttachmentType>
1519: 						<AttachmentID>
1520: 							<xsl:value-of select="normalize-space($eachAtt[$count]/CONTENTID)"/>
1521: 						</AttachmentID>
1522: 						<xsl:variable name="mergedContent">
1523: 							<xsl:call-template name="join">
1524: 								<xsl:with-param name="list" select="E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET"/>
1525: 							</xsl:call-template>
1526: 						</xsl:variable>
1527: 						<AttachmentContent>
1528: 							<xsl:value-of select="$mergedContent"/>
1529: 						</AttachmentContent>
1530: 					</Attachment>
1531: 				</xsl:for-each>
1532: 			</AttachmentList>
1533: 		</xsl:if>
1534: 	</xsl:template>
1535: 	<xsl:template name="join">
1536: 		<xsl:param name="list"/>
1537: 		<xsl:for-each select="$list">
1538: 			<xsl:value-of select="CONTENT"/>
1539: 		</xsl:for-each>
1540: 	</xsl:template>
1541: 	<xsl:template name="addContenIdIDOC">
1542: 		<!-- addContenIdIDOC  -->
1543: 		<!-- Takes all the content ID for the attachment from the IDOC and adds it to the -->
1544: 		<!-- <URL> segment under <Comments><Attachment> segment of the cXML.              -->		
1545: 		<!-- input  eachAtt	         : All the attachment details under <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> segment
1546: 			        lineNumber       : Line number for line level attachments from E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET/LINENUMBER
1547:              output              	 : cXML message with <Attachment><URL>
1548:              ____________________________________________________________________________________
1549:              template used by        : MapMultiple_Text_Comments_IDOC_To_cXML 
1550:                                      : 
1551:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_EnquiryOrder_cXML_0000_OrderStatusRequest.xsl
1552:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_Order_cXML_0000_OrderRequest.xsl
1553:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_PaymentRemittanceRequest_cXML_0000_PaymentRemittance.xsl
1554:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QuoteRequest_cXML_0000_QuoteRequest.xsl		-->
1555: 		<xsl:param name="eachAtt"/>
1556: 		<xsl:param name="lineNumber"/>
1557: 		<xsl:choose>
1558: 			<xsl:when test="$lineNumber">
1559: 				<!-- Line Level Attachments  -->
1560: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt[ number(LINENUMBER) =  number($lineNumber)]">
1561: 					<Attachment>
1562: 						<URL>
1563: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat('cid:', normalize-space(CONTENTID))"/>
1564: 						</URL>
1565: 					</Attachment>
1566: 				</xsl:for-each>
1567: 			</xsl:when>
1568: 			<xsl:otherwise>
1569: 				<!-- Header Level Attachments  -->
1570: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt[string-length(LINENUMBER) = 0]">
1571: 					<Attachment>
1572: 						<URL>
1573: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat('cid:', normalize-space(CONTENTID))"/>
1574: 						</URL>
1575: 					</Attachment>
1576: 				</xsl:for-each>
1577: 			</xsl:otherwise>
1578: 		</xsl:choose>
1579: 	</xsl:template>
1580: 	<xsl:template name="addContenId">
1581: 		<!-- addContenId  -->
1582: 		<!-- Takes all the content ID for the attachment from the proxy structures and adds -->
1583: 		<!-- it to the <URL> segment under <Comments><Attachment> segment of the cXML.      -->		
1584: 		<!-- input  eachAtt	         : All the attachment details under <Attachments> segment
1585: 			        lineNumber       : Line number for line level attachments from Attachments/LineNumber
1586:              output              	 : cXML message with <Attachment><URL>
1587:              __________________________________________________________________________________
1588:              template used by        : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_PurchaseRequisition_cXML_0000_PurchaseRequisitionRequest.xsl
1589:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QualityInspectionRequest_cXML_0000_QualityInspectionRequest.xsl
1590:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_QualityIssueNotificationMessage_cXML_0000_QualityNotificationRequest.xsl
1591:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_SalesOrderConfirmation_cXML_0000_ConfirmationRequest.xsl
1592:                                      : MAPPING_ANY_AddOn_0000_ShipNoticeRequest_cXML_0000_ShipNoticeRequest.xsl	-->
1593: 		<xsl:param name="eachAtt"/>
1594: 		<xsl:param name="lineNumber"/>
1595: 		<xsl:choose>
1596: 			<xsl:when test="$lineNumber">
1597: 				<!-- Line Level Attachments  -->
1598: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt[LineNumber = $lineNumber]">
1599: 					<Attachment>
1600: 						<URL>
1601: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat('cid:', normalize-space(ContentId))"/>
1602: 						</URL>
1603: 					</Attachment>
1604: 				</xsl:for-each>
1605: 			</xsl:when>
1606: 			<xsl:otherwise>
1607: 				<!-- Header Level Attachments  -->
1608: 				<xsl:for-each select="$eachAtt[string-length(LineNumber) = 0]">
1609: 					<Attachment>
1610: 						<URL>
1611: 							<xsl:value-of select="concat('cid:', normalize-space(ContentId))"/>
1612: 						</URL>
1613: 					</Attachment>
1614: 				</xsl:for-each>
1615: 			</xsl:otherwise>
1616: 		</xsl:choose>
1617: 	</xsl:template>
1618: 	<xsl:template name="removeChild">
1619: 		<xsl:param name="p_comment"/>
1620: 		<xsl:value-of select="$p_comment/text()"/>
1621: 	</xsl:template>
1622: 	<!-- Region Code Description Type-->
1623: 	<xsl:template name="GetRegionDesc">
1624: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1625: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1626: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1627: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1628: 			<xsl:value-of
1629: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/GetRegionCodeDescription)"
1630: 			/>
1631: 		</xsl:if>
1632: 	</xsl:template>
1633: 
1634: 	<!-- Strategic Sourcing Dummy Vendor-->
1635: 	<xsl:template name="StrategicSourcingDummyVendor">
1636: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1637: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1638: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1639: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1640: 			<xsl:value-of
1641: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DummyVendor[1])"
1642: 			/>
1643: 		</xsl:if>
1644: 	</xsl:template>
1645: 	<xsl:template name="ReadQuote">
1646: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
1647: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
1648: 		<xsl:param name="p_attribute"/>
1649: 		<xsl:if test="$p_doctype != '' and $p_pd != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
1650: 			<!--calling the binary PD -->
1651: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
1652: 			<xsl:choose>
1653: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'AccountAssignmentCat'">
1654: 					<xsl:if
1655: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/AccountAssignmentCategory))">
1656: 						<xsl:value-of
1657: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/AccountAssignmentCategory"
1658: 						/>
1659: 					</xsl:if>
1660: 				</xsl:when>
1661: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'Asset'">
1662: 					<xsl:if
1663: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/Asset))">
1664: 						<xsl:value-of
1665: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/Asset"
1666: 						/>
1667: 					</xsl:if>
1668: 				</xsl:when>
1669: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'GrossPrice'">
1670: 					<xsl:if
1671: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/GrossPrice))">
1672: 						<xsl:value-of
1673: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/GrossPrice"
1674: 						/>
1675: 					</xsl:if>
1676: 				</xsl:when>
1677: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'ServiceGrossPrice'">
1678: 					<xsl:if
1679: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/TotalPrice))">
1680: 						<xsl:value-of
1681: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/TotalPrice"
1682: 						/>
1683: 					</xsl:if>
1684: 				</xsl:when>
1685: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'CostCenter'">
1686: 					<xsl:if
1687: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/CostCenter))">
1688: 						<xsl:value-of
1689: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/CostCenter"
1690: 						/>
1691: 					</xsl:if>
1692: 				</xsl:when>
1693: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'GLAccount'">
1694: 					<xsl:if
1695: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/GLAccount))">
1696: 						<xsl:value-of
1697: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/GLAccount"
1698: 						/>
1699: 					</xsl:if>
1700: 				</xsl:when>
1701: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'SubNumber'">
1702: 					<xsl:if
1703: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/AssetSubNumber))">
1704: 						<xsl:value-of
1705: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/AssetSubNumber"
1706: 						/>
1707: 					</xsl:if>
1708: 				</xsl:when>
1709: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'WBSElement'">
1710: 					<xsl:if
1711: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/WBSElement))">
1712: 						<xsl:value-of
1713: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/WBSElement"
1714: 						/>
1715: 					</xsl:if>
1716: 				</xsl:when>
1717: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'Order'">
1718: 					<xsl:if
1719: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/Order))">
1720: 						<xsl:value-of
1721: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/Order"
1722: 						/>
1723: 					</xsl:if>
1724: 				</xsl:when>

1726: 					<xsl:if
1727: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1]))">
1728: 						<xsl:value-of
1729: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID[1]"
1730: 						/>
1731: 					</xsl:if>
1732: 				</xsl:when>

1734: 					<xsl:if

1739: 					</xsl:if>

1746: 						/>
1747: 					</xsl:if>
1748: 				</xsl:when>

1750: 					<xsl:if
1751: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatService))">
1752: 						<xsl:value-of
1753: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatService"
1754: 						/>
1755: 					</xsl:if>
1756: 				</xsl:when>
1757: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'ItemCatStandard'">
1758: 					<xsl:if
1759: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatStandard))">
1760: 						<xsl:value-of
1761: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatStandard"
1762: 						/>
1763: 					</xsl:if>
1764: 				</xsl:when>
1765: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'ItemCatMaterial'">
1766: 					<xsl:if
1767: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatStandard))">
1768: 						<xsl:value-of
1769: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ItemCatStandard"
1770: 						/>
1771: 					</xsl:if>
1772: 				</xsl:when>
1773: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'DeductionPercent'">
1774: 					<xsl:if
1775: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DiscountPercentage))">
1776: 						<xsl:value-of
1777: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DiscountPercentage"
1778: 						/>
1779: 					</xsl:if>
1780: 				</xsl:when>

1782: 					<xsl:if

1784: 						<xsl:value-of
1785: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/DiscountAbs"
1786: 						/>
1787: 					</xsl:if>
1788: 				</xsl:when>

1790: 					<xsl:if

1890: 						/>
1891: 					</xsl:if>
1892: 				</xsl:when>

1894: 					<xsl:if

1896: 						<xsl:value-of
1897: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextTypecode"
1898: 						/>
1899: 					</xsl:if>

1906: 						/>

1942: 					<xsl:if

1946: 						/>
1947: 					</xsl:if>
1948: 				</xsl:when>

1954: 						/>
1955: 					</xsl:if>
1956: 				</xsl:when>

1962: 						/>

1965: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'ExternalServiceLineNote'">
