1967: 					<xsl:if
1968: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ExternalServiceLineNote[1]))">
1969: 						<xsl:value-of
1970: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/ExternalServiceLineNote[1]"
1971: 						/>
1972: 					</xsl:if>
1973: 				</xsl:when>
1974: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'InternalServiceLineNote'">
1975: 					<xsl:if
1976: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/InternalServiceLineNote[1]))">
1977: 						<xsl:value-of
1978: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/InternalServiceLineNote[1]"
1979: 						/>
1980: 					</xsl:if>
1981: 				</xsl:when>
1982: 				<xsl:when test="$p_attribute = 'UserName'">
1983: 					<xsl:if
1984: 						test="(exists($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/UserName))">
1985: 						<xsl:value-of
1986: 							select="$crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/UserName"
1987: 						/>
1988: 					</xsl:if>
1989: 				</xsl:when>
1990: 			</xsl:choose>
1991: 		</xsl:if>
1992: 	</xsl:template>
1993: 
1994: 	<xsl:template name="RemoveScientificNotation">
1995: 		<xsl:param name="p_input"/>
1996: 		<xsl:param name="p_dataType"/>
1997: 		<xsl:param name="p_dec"/>
1998: 		<!--Compute actual value by removing Scientific notation-->
1999: 		<xsl:variable name="v_result">
2000: 			<xsl:choose>
2001: 				<xsl:when test="matches($p_input, '^\-?[\d\.,]*[Ee][+\-]*\d*$')">
2002: 					<xsl:value-of select="format-number(number($p_input), '#0.#############')"
2003: 					> </xsl:value-of>
2004: 				</xsl:when>
2005: 				<xsl:otherwise>
2006: 					<xsl:value-of select="string($p_input)"/>
2007: 				</xsl:otherwise>
2008: 			</xsl:choose>
2009: 		</xsl:variable>
2010: 		<!--Format the result in required format-->
2011: 		<xsl:choose>
2012: 			<xsl:when test="$p_dataType = 'NUM' or $p_dataType = 'CURR'">
2013: 				<!--Append ZEROs to the result-->
2014: 				<xsl:choose>
2015: 					<xsl:when test="number($p_dec) = 0 or $p_dec = ''">
2016: 						<xsl:value-of select="$v_result"/>
2017: 					</xsl:when>
2018: 					<xsl:when test="not(matches(string($v_result), '\.'))">
2019: 						<xsl:variable name="v_decplaces">
2020: 							<xsl:value-of
2021: 								select="substring('000000000000000000000000000000', 1, number($p_dec))"
2022: 							/>
2023: 						</xsl:variable>
2024: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_result, '.', $v_decplaces)"/>
2025: 					</xsl:when>
2026: 					<xsl:when
2027: 						test="string-length(substring-after($v_result, '.')) &lt; number($p_dec)">
2028: 						<xsl:variable name="v_decplaces">
2029: 							<xsl:value-of
2030: 								select="substring('000000000000000000000000000000', 1, number(number($p_dec) - string-length(substring-after($v_result, '.'))))"
2031: 							/>
2032: 						</xsl:variable>
2033: 						<xsl:value-of select="concat(string($v_result), $v_decplaces)"/>
2034: 					</xsl:when>
2035: 					<xsl:otherwise>
2036: 						<xsl:value-of select="$v_result"/>
2037: 					</xsl:otherwise>
2038: 				</xsl:choose>
2039: 			</xsl:when>
2040: 			<xsl:when test="$p_dataType = 'DATE'">
2041: 				<xsl:value-of
2042: 					select="concat(substring($v_result, 7, 2), '-', substring($v_result, 5, 2), '-', substring($v_result, 1, 4))"
2043: 				/>
2044: 			</xsl:when>
2045: 			<xsl:when test="$p_dataType = 'TIME'">
2046: 				<xsl:choose>
2047: 					<xsl:when test="string-length($v_result) = 5">
2048: 						<xsl:value-of
2049: 							select="concat('0', substring($v_result, 1, 1), ':', substring($v_result, 2, 2), ':', substring($v_result, 4, 2))"
2050: 						/>
2051: 					</xsl:when>
2052: 					<xsl:otherwise>
2053: 						<xsl:value-of
2054: 							select="concat(substring($v_result, 1, 2), ':', substring($v_result, 3, 2), ':', substring($v_result, 5, 2))"
2055: 						/>
2056: 					</xsl:otherwise>
2057: 				</xsl:choose>
2058: 			</xsl:when>
2059: 		</xsl:choose>
2060: 	</xsl:template>
2061: 
2062: 	<xsl:template name="BuildTimestamp">
2063: 		<xsl:param name="p_date"/>
2064: 		<xsl:param name="p_time"/>
2065: 		<xsl:if test="$p_date != ''">
2066: 			<xsl:variable name="v_date"
2067: 				select="concat(substring($p_date, 1, 4), '-', substring($p_date, 5, 2), '-', substring($p_date, 7, 2))"/>
2068: 			<xsl:variable name="v_time"
2069: 				select="concat(substring($p_time, 1, 2), ':', substring($p_time, 3, 2), ':', substring($p_time, 5, 2))"/>
2070: 			<xsl:value-of select="concat($v_date, 'T', $v_time)"/>
2071: 		</xsl:if>
2072: 	</xsl:template>
2073: 
2074: 	<xsl:template name="ArticleMaster">
2075: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
2076: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
2077: 		<xsl:param name="p_attribute"/>
2078: 		<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'External'">
2079: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
2080: 			<xsl:value-of
2081: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/External)"
2082: 			/>
2083: 		</xsl:if>
2084: 		<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'BomUsage'">
2085: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
2086: 			<xsl:value-of
2087: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/BomUsage)"
2088: 			/>
2089: 		</xsl:if>
2090: 		<xsl:if test="$p_attribute = 'EANCategory'">
2091: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
2092: 			<xsl:value-of
2093: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/EANCategory)"
2094: 			/>
2095: 		</xsl:if>
2096: 	</xsl:template>
2097: 	<xsl:template name="Convert_UTC_cXML_Supplier">
2098: 		<xsl:param name="p_utcTime"/>
2099: 		<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring($p_utcTime, 0, 20), '+00:00')"/>
2100: 	</xsl:template>
2101: 	<!-- Begin of IG-17553 for getting line level attachments & multiple attachments at both header and line item level -->	
2102: 	<!-- for Inbound multiple attachments -->
2103: 	<xsl:template name="InboundMultiAttIdoc_Common">
2104: 		<!-- Begin of IG-20169 -->
2105: 		<!-- Map multiple attachments from cXML to IDOC  -->
2106: 		<!-- Takes all the attachments from the cXML including the payload as cXML and PDF  -->
2107: 		<!-- and map it to the <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> segments in the IDOC.  -->
2108: 		<!-- The header attachment will be mapped first then the attachments at the lines.  -->
2109: 		<!-- If the payload is sent as an attachment (*.xml or *.pdf), this will be done    -->
2110: 		<!-- after the header and line/s attachments.                                       -->
2111: 		<!-- Header attachments details with no line numbers will be in the variable "headerAtt" -->
2112: 		<!-- Line attachments details with line numbers will be in the variable "lineReference"  -->
2113: 		<!-- input   headerAtt         : All attachments at header level
2114: 			         lineReference     : All attachments at line level along with line numbers			      		             
2115:              output         	       : Attachments segments <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> in the IDOC -->
2116: 		<!-- End of IG-20169 -->
2117: 		<xsl:param name="headerAtt"/>
2118: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
2119: 		<xsl:variable name="attList" select="AttachmentList"/>
2120: 		<!-- Begin of IG-20169 -->
2121: 		<!-- get all the attachment ID of the header and line attachment -->
2122: 		<xsl:variable name="allAttachmentsWithCid">
2123: 			<xsl:for-each select="$headerAtt">
2124: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-after(.,'cid:'),',')"/>
2125: 			</xsl:for-each>
2126: 			<xsl:for-each select="$lineReference">
2127: 				<xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-after(.,'cid:'),',')"/>
2128: 			</xsl:for-each>
2129: 		</xsl:variable>
2130: 		<!-- End of IG-20169 -->
2131: 		<xsl:for-each select="$headerAtt">
2132: 			<xsl:if test="contains(., 'cid:')">
2133: 				<xsl:variable name="cid" select="substring-after(., 'cid:')"/>
2134: 				<xsl:variable name="selectedAtt"
2135: 					select="$attList/Attachment[AttachmentID = $cid]"/>
2136: 				<xsl:for-each select="$selectedAtt">
2137: 				<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2138: 					<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
2139: 					<FILENAME>
2140: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentName"/>
2141: 					</FILENAME>
2142: 					<CONTENTTYPE>
2143: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentType"/>
2144: 					</CONTENTTYPE>
2145: 					<CONTENTID>
2146: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentID"/>
2147: 					</CONTENTID>
2148: 					<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContentIdoc_Common">
2149: 						<xsl:with-param name="content" select="AttachmentContent"/>
2150: 					</xsl:call-template>
2151: 				</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2152: 				</xsl:for-each>
2153: 			</xsl:if>
2154: 		</xsl:for-each>
2155: 		<xsl:for-each select="$lineReference">
2156: 			<xsl:variable name="index" select="position()"/>
2157: 			<xsl:if test="contains(., 'cid:')">
2158: 				<xsl:variable name="cid" select="substring-after(., 'cid:')"/>
2159: 				<xsl:variable name="selectedAtt"
2160: 					select="$attList/Attachment[AttachmentID = $cid]"/>
2161: 				<xsl:for-each select="$selectedAtt">
2162: 				<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2163: 					<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
2164: 					<FILENAME>
2165: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentName"/>
2166: 					</FILENAME>
2167: 					<CONTENTTYPE>
2168: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentType"/>
2169: 					</CONTENTTYPE>
2170: 					<CONTENTID>
2171: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentID"/>
2172: 					</CONTENTID>
2173: 					<LINENUMBER>
2174: 						<xsl:call-template name="getLineNo_Common">
2175: 							<xsl:with-param name="array" select="$lineReference"/>
2176: 							<xsl:with-param name="index" select="$index"/>
2177: 						</xsl:call-template>
2178: 					</LINENUMBER>
2179: 					<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContentIdoc_Common">
2180: 						<xsl:with-param name="content" select="AttachmentContent"/>
2181: 					</xsl:call-template>						
2182: 				</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2183: 				</xsl:for-each>
2184: 			</xsl:if>
2185: 		</xsl:for-each>
2186: 		<!-- Begin of IG-20169 -->
2187: 		<!-- If the payload is sent as an attachment (*.xml or *.pdf), there will be no CID. -->
2188: 		<!-- However these will be present in the payload. Loop through all the attachments  -->
2189: 		<!-- coming in the payload and print only those that do not have a CID. Header and   -->
2190: 		<!-- Line attachment have already been printed in the above section of the code      -->
2191: 		<xsl:for-each select="$attList/Attachment">
2192: 			<xsl:if test="not(contains($allAttachmentsWithCid,AttachmentID))">
2193: 				<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2194: 					<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
2195: 					<FILENAME>
2196: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentName"/>
2197: 					</FILENAME>
2198: 					<CONTENTTYPE>
2199: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentType"/>
2200: 					</CONTENTTYPE>
2201: 					<CONTENTID>
2202: 						<xsl:value-of select="AttachmentID"/>
2203: 					</CONTENTID>
2204: 					<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContentIdoc_Common">
2205: 						<xsl:with-param name="content" select="AttachmentContent"/>
2206: 					</xsl:call-template>
2207: 				</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>
2208: 			</xsl:if>
2209: 		</xsl:for-each>	
2210: 		<!-- End of IG-20169 -->
2211: 	</xsl:template>
2212: 	<xsl:template name="getLineNo_Common">
2213: 		<xsl:param name="array"/>
2214: 		<xsl:param name="index"/>
2215: 		<xsl:choose>
2216: 			<xsl:when test="contains($array[$index - 1], 'cid:')">
2217: 				<xsl:call-template name="getLineNo_Common">
2218: 					<xsl:with-param name="array" select="$array"/>
2219: 					<xsl:with-param name="index" select="$index - 1"/>
2220: 				</xsl:call-template>
2221: 			</xsl:when>
2222: 			<xsl:otherwise>
2223: 				<xsl:value-of select="$array[$index - 1]"/>
2224: 			</xsl:otherwise>
2225: 		</xsl:choose>
2226: 	</xsl:template>
2227: 	<xsl:template name="splitAttContentIdoc_Common">
2228: 		<!-- Split the attachment contents from cXML to IDOC  -->
2229: 		<!-- Takes all the attachment contensts from the cXML including the payload as *.PDF  -->
2230: 		<!-- and *.cXML and map it to the <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET> segments in the IDOC. -->
2231: 		<!-- IDOC has a limitation of 1000 characters in the <CONTENT> field. The IDOC segment-->
2232: 		<!-- <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET> will be repeated after every 1000 characters.      -->		
2233: 		<!-- input   content           : All attachment contents of both header and line level		      		             
2234:              output         	       : Attachment content segments <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET> in the IDOC
2235:              ________________________________________________________________________________________________
2236:              template used by          : splitAttContentIdoc_Common (recursive call)
2237:                                        : InboundMultiAttIdoc_Common
2238: 		-->
2239: 		<xsl:param name="content"/>
2240: 		<xsl:variable name="line-length" select="1000"/>
2241: 		<xsl:variable name="line" select="substring($content, 1, $line-length)"/>
2242: 		<xsl:variable name="rest" select="substring($content, $line-length + 1)"/>
2243: 		<xsl:if test="$line">
2244: 			<E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET>
2245: 				<xsl:attribute name="SEGMENT">1</xsl:attribute>
2246: 				<CONTENT>
2247: 					<xsl:value-of select="$line"/>
2248: 				</CONTENT>
2249: 			</E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_CONTENT_DET>
2250: 		</xsl:if>
2251: 		<xsl:if test="$rest">
2252: 			<xsl:call-template name="splitAttContentIdoc_Common">
2253: 				<xsl:with-param name="content" select="$rest"/>
2254: 			</xsl:call-template>
2255: 		</xsl:if>
2256: 	</xsl:template>    
2257: 	<!-- End of IG-17553 -->	
2258: <!--Template to Map TaxCatergories on Incoming FI Invoice Documents-->
2259: 	<xsl:template name="TaxTypeMap">
2260: 		<xsl:param name="p_taxcat"/>
2261: 		<xsl:param name="p_anERPSystemID"/>
2262: 		<xsl:param name="p_anReceiverID"/>
2263: 		<xsl:param name="p_anSourceDocumentType"/>
2264: <!--Mapping the Tax Type, in case any tax type is mainatined in the Look Up consider that value, 
2265:     if not map the below default values respectively-->
2266: 		<xsl:variable name="v_mwskz">
2267: 			<xsl:call-template name="LookupTemplate">
2268: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_anERPSystemID" select="$p_anERPSystemID"/>
2269: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_anSupplierANID" select="$p_anReceiverID"/>
2270: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_producttype" select="'AribaNetwork'"/>
2271: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_doctype" select="$p_anSourceDocumentType"/>
2272: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_lookupname" select="'TaxCategoryMatchingType'"/>
2273: 				<xsl:with-param name="p_input" select="$p_taxcat"/>
2274: 			</xsl:call-template>
2275: 		</xsl:variable>
2276: 		<xsl:choose>
2277: 			<xsl:when test="string-length($v_mwskz) &gt; 0">
2278: 				<xsl:value-of select="$v_mwskz"/>
2279: 			</xsl:when>
2280: 			<!--Sales Tax -->
2281: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "sales"'>
2282: 				<xsl:value-of select="'SAL'"/>
2283: 			</xsl:when>
2284: 			<!-- Usage-->
2285: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "usage"'>
2286: 				<xsl:value-of select="'USE'"/>
2287: 			</xsl:when>
2288: 			<!-- GST-->
2289: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "gst"'>
2290: 				<xsl:value-of select="'GST'"/>
2291: 			</xsl:when>
2292: 			<!--HST-->
2293: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "hst"'>
2294: 				<xsl:value-of select="'HST'"/>
2295: 			</xsl:when>
2296: 			<!--PST-->
2297: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "pst"'>
2298: 				<xsl:value-of select="'PST'"/>
2299: 			</xsl:when>
2300: 			<!-- QST-->
2301: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "qst"'>
2302: 				<xsl:value-of select="'QST'"/>
2303: 			</xsl:when>
2304: 			<!--VAT-->
2305: 			<xsl:when test='$p_taxcat = "vat"'>
2306: 				<xsl:value-of select="'VAT'"/>
2307: 			</xsl:when>
2308: 			<xsl:otherwise>
2309: 				<xsl:value-of select="$p_taxcat"/>
2310: 			</xsl:otherwise>
2311: 		</xsl:choose>
2312: 	</xsl:template>
2313: <!--	Mapping Address ID and Contact details; This is used in Incoming FI Invoice-->
2314: 	<xsl:template name="MapPartyDetails">
2315: 		<xsl:param name="p_contactDetails"/>  
2316: 		<xsl:if test="string-length($p_contactDetails/@addressID) > 0">
2317: 			<InternalID>
2318: 				<xsl:value-of select="$p_contactDetails/@addressID"/>
2319: 			</InternalID>
2320: 		</xsl:if>
2321: 		<xsl:if test="string-length($p_contactDetails/Name) > 0">
2322: 			<Address>
2323: 				<OrganisationFormOfAddress>
2324: 					<Name>
2325: 						<!-- IG-37398, Integration of IG-37266 -->
2326: 						<xsl:value-of select="substring($p_contactDetails/Name, 1, 40)"/>
2327: 					</Name>
2328: 				</OrganisationFormOfAddress>                            
2329: 			</Address>
2330: 		</xsl:if>    
2331: 	</xsl:template>
2332: 	
2333: 	<!-- Split the multiple lines in comments only for Header  -->
2334: 	<xsl:template name="CommentsFillIDOCOutSplitLine">
2335: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
2336: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
2337: 		<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment != ''">
2338: 			<xsl:for-each select="$p_aribaComment">
2339: 				<xsl:if test="exists(TDLINE)">
2340: 					<xsl:value-of
2341: 						select="concat('&#xa;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
2342: 				</xsl:if>
2343: 			</xsl:for-each>							
2344: 		</xsl:if>
2345: 	</xsl:template> 
2346: 	
2347: 	
2348: 	<xsl:template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_IDOC_To_cXML">
2349: 		<!-- Map multiple comments from IDOC to cXML  -->
2350: 		<!-- Takes all the comments and attachment from the IDOC and creates as many <Comments>  -->
2351: 		<!-- segments in the cXML as there are comments in E1EDKT1/E1EDPT1/E1EDCT1  -->
2352: 		<!-- Attachments will only be created to the first <Comment> segment  -->
2353: 		<!-- input  p_aribaComment	       : Comment Segment from IDOC E1EDKT1/E1EDPT1/E1EDCT1
2354: 			        p_itemNumber           : Line Number(POSEX)
2355: 			        p_targetdoctype        : Target Document Type (OrderRequest)
2356: 			        p_sourcedoctype        : Source Document Type (Order/SchedulingAgreement)
2357: 			        p_pd                   : Cross Reference Parameter  
2358: 			        p_onlyattachnocomments : Variable for checking if Attachments exists
2359: 			        p_attach               : Attachment Content <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> segment from the IDOC			             
2360:              output              	       : cXML message with <Comments><Attachments> 	-->
2361: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
2362: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
2363: 		<xsl:param name="p_targetdoctype"/>
2364: 		<xsl:param name="p_sourcedoctype"/>
2365: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
2366: 		<xsl:param name="p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2367: 		<xsl:param name="p_attach"/>
2368: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
2369: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
2370: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textID">
2371: 				<xsl:choose>
2372: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $p_itemNumber != ''">
2373: 						<xsl:value-of
2374: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/LineTextID)"
2375: 						/>
2376: 					</xsl:when>
2377: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and normalize-space($p_itemNumber) = ''">
2378: 						<xsl:value-of
2379: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/HeaderTextID)"
2380: 						/>
2381: 					</xsl:when>
2382: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_itemNumber != ''">
2383: 						<xsl:value-of
2384: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/LineTextIDPO)"
2385: 						/>
2386: 					</xsl:when>
2387: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and normalize-space($p_itemNumber) = ''">
2388: 						<xsl:value-of
2389: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/HeaderTextIDPO)"
2390: 						/>
2391: 					</xsl:when>
2392: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $p_itemNumber != ''">
2393: 						<xsl:value-of
2394: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/LineTextID[1])"
2395: 						/>
2396: 					</xsl:when>
2397: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and normalize-space($p_itemNumber)= ''">
2398: 						<xsl:value-of
2399: 							select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_targetdoctype]/HeaderTextID[1])"
2400: 						/>	
2401: 					</xsl:when>									
2402: 				</xsl:choose>
2403: 			</xsl:variable>
2404: 			<!-- Check if the TDID in the IDOC to exists in the cross reference  -->
2405: 			<!-- IG-20409 Begin  -->
2406: 			<xsl:variable name="v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef">
2407: 				<xsl:choose>
2408: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest'">
2409: 						<xsl:for-each select="$p_aribaComment/TDID">
2410: 							<xsl:if test="contains($v_textID,.)">
2411: 								<xsl:value-of select="'TRUE'"/>
2412: 							</xsl:if>
2413: 						</xsl:for-each>
2414: 					</xsl:when>
2415: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order'">
2416: 						<xsl:for-each select="$p_aribaComment/TDID">
2417: 							<xsl:if test="contains($v_textID,.)">
2418: 								<xsl:value-of select="'TRUE'"/>
2419: 							</xsl:if>
2420: 						</xsl:for-each>
2421: 					</xsl:when>
2422: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and string-length($p_itemNumber) = 0">
2423: 						<xsl:for-each select="$p_aribaComment[TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']/TDID">
2424: 							<xsl:if test="contains($v_textID,.)">
2425: 								<xsl:value-of select="'TRUE'"/>
2426: 							</xsl:if>
2427: 						</xsl:for-each>
2428: 					</xsl:when>
2429: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and string-length($p_itemNumber) > 0">
2430: 						<xsl:for-each select="$p_aribaComment[TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber]/TDID">
2431: 							<xsl:if test="contains($v_textID,.)">
2432: 								<xsl:value-of select="'TRUE'"/>
2433: 							</xsl:if>
2434: 						</xsl:for-each>
2435: 					</xsl:when>
2436: 				</xsl:choose>				
2437: 			</xsl:variable>
2438: 			<!-- IG-20409 End  -->
2439: 			<!-- IG-20409 Use $v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef to check for Comments and Attachments   -->
2440: 			<xsl:choose>
2441: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $p_aribaComment/TDID and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2442: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2443: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2444: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2445: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2446: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2447: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2448: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_header"/>						
2449: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2450: 					</xsl:call-template>
2451: 				</xsl:when>
2452: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $p_aribaComment = E1EDPT1 and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2453: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2454: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2455: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2456: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2457: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2458: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2459: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2460: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_line"/>
2461: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2462: 					</xsl:call-template>
2463: 				</xsl:when>
2464: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $p_aribaComment = E1EDCT1  and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2465: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2466: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2467: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2468: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2469: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2470: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2471: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2472: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_service_line"/>
2473: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2474: 					</xsl:call-template>
2475: 				</xsl:when>
2476: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_aribaComment/TDID and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2477: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2478: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2479: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2480: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2481: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2482: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2483: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_header"/>						
2484: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2485: 					</xsl:call-template>
2486: 				</xsl:when>
2487: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_aribaComment = E1EDPT1 and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2488: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2489: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2490: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2491: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2492: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2493: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2494: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2495: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_line"/>
2496: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2497: 					</xsl:call-template>
2498: 				</xsl:when>
2499: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_aribaComment = E1EDCT1  and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2500: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2501: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2502: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2503: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2504: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2505: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2506: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2507: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_service_line"/>
2508: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2509: 					</xsl:call-template>
2510: 				</xsl:when>
2511: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2512: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2513: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2514: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2515: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2516: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2517: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2518: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_header"/>
2519: 						<xsl:with-param name="transaction" select="'SchedulingAgreement'"/>
2520: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2521: 					</xsl:call-template>
2522: 				</xsl:when>
2523: 				<xsl:when
2524: 					test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber] and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) > 0">
2525: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2526: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string" select="$v_textID"/>
2527: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="','"/>
2528: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$p_aribaComment"/>
2529: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$p_attach"/>
2530: 						<xsl:with-param name="onlyattachnocomments"  select="$p_onlyattachnocomments"/>
2531: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2532: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel_line"/>
2533: 						<xsl:with-param name="transaction" select="'SchedulingAgreement'"/>
2534: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="1"/>
2535: 					</xsl:call-template>
2536: 				</xsl:when>				
2537: 			</xsl:choose>
2538: 			<!-- Check if only Attachments are in the IDOC payload with no Comments -->
2539: 			<!-- IG-20409 Use $v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef to check for attachments with no Comments   -->
2540: 			<xsl:variable name="v_onlyattachnocomments">
2541: 				<xsl:choose>
2542: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and  $p_itemNumber = '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2543: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2544: 					</xsl:when>
2545: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $p_itemNumber != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2546: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2547: 					</xsl:when>
2548: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and  $p_itemNumber = '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2549: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2550: 					</xsl:when>
2551: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_itemNumber != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2552: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2553: 					</xsl:when>
2554: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $p_itemNumber != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2555: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2556: 					</xsl:when>
2557: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $p_itemNumber = '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2558: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>
2559: 					</xsl:when>
2560: 					<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $p_itemNumber != '' and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2561: 						<xsl:value-of select="'1'"/>					
2562: 					</xsl:when>
2563: 				</xsl:choose>
2564: 			</xsl:variable>	
2565: 			<!-- Map only Attachments when no Comments are found -->
2566: 			<!-- IG-20409 Use $v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef to check for attachments with no Comments   -->
2567: 			<xsl:choose>
2568: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'QuoteRequest' and $v_onlyattachnocomments ='1' and string-length($p_onlyattachnocomments) > 0 and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2569: 					<Comments xml:lang="">
2570: 						<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
2571: 							<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$p_attach"/>
2572: 							<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2573: 						</xsl:call-template>
2574: 					</Comments>
2575: 				</xsl:when>
2576: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'Order' and $v_onlyattachnocomments ='1' and string-length($p_onlyattachnocomments) > 0 and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0">
2577: 					<Comments xml:lang="">
2578: 						<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
2579: 							<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$p_attach"/>
2580: 							<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2581: 						</xsl:call-template>
2582: 					</Comments>
2583: 				</xsl:when>
2584: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $v_onlyattachnocomments ='1' and string-length($p_onlyattachnocomments) > 0 and (not($p_aribaComment[TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']) or ($p_aribaComment[TDOBJECT = 'EKKO'] and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0)) and $p_itemNumber = ''">
2585: 					<Comments xml:lang="">
2586: 						<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
2587: 							<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$p_attach"/>
2588: 							<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2589: 						</xsl:call-template>
2590: 					</Comments>
2591: 				</xsl:when>		
2592: 				<xsl:when test="$p_sourcedoctype = 'ScheduleAgreementRelease' and $v_onlyattachnocomments ='1' and string-length($p_onlyattachnocomments) > 0 and (not($p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO']) or ($p_aribaComment[ITEMNUMBER = $p_itemNumber][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'] and string-length($v_ifIDOCTextIDExistsCrossRef) = 0)) and $p_itemNumber !=''">
2593: 					<Comments xml:lang="">
2594: 						<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
2595: 							<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$p_attach"/>
2596: 							<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2597: 						</xsl:call-template>
2598: 					</Comments>
2599: 				</xsl:when>		
2600: 			</xsl:choose>						
2601: 		</xsl:if>
2602: 	</xsl:template>
2603: 	<!-- Long Text Transfer for Proxy Outbound Transactions via CIG	 -->
2604: 	<xsl:template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_Proxy_To_cXML">
2605: 		<xsl:param name="p_aribaComment"/>
2606: 		<xsl:param name="p_itemNumber"/>
2607: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
2608: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
2609: 		<xsl:param name="p_trans"/>
2610: 		<xsl:variable name="v_arbcom" select="$p_itemNumber"/>
2611: 		<xsl:if test="$p_aribaComment != '' and $anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
2612: 			<!-- calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF  -->
2613: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
2614: 			<!--  Read TextId from PD  -->
2615: 			<xsl:variable name="v_textID">
2616: 				<xsl:choose>
2617: 					<!-- This is for Dispatch Delivery notification Transaction	 -->
2618: 					<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'DDN'">
2619: 						<xsl:choose>
2620: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
2621: 								<xsl:value-of select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextIDDDN)"/>
2622: 							</xsl:when>
2623: 							<xsl:otherwise>
2624: 								<xsl:value-of select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextIDDDN)"/>
2625: 							</xsl:otherwise>
2626: 						</xsl:choose>
2627: 					</xsl:when>
2628: 					<xsl:otherwise>
2629: 						<xsl:choose>
2630: 							<xsl:when test="$p_itemNumber != ''">
2631: 								<xsl:value-of select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/LineTextID)"/>
2632: 							</xsl:when>
2633: 							<xsl:otherwise>
2634: 								<xsl:value-of select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/HeaderTextID)"/>
2635: 							</xsl:otherwise>
2636: 						</xsl:choose>
2637: 					</xsl:otherwise>
2638: 				</xsl:choose>
2639: 			</xsl:variable>
2640: 			<!--  Filter the HeaderTextID from PD values  -->
2641: 			<!-- For DispatchDeliveryNotification-->
2642: 			<xsl:choose>
2643: 				<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'DDN'">
2644: 					<!--  Filter the HeaderTextID from PD values  -->
2645: 					<xsl:if
2646: 						test="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber)] and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != ''">
2647: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
2648: 							<xsl:for-each
2649: 								select="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
2650: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2651: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2652: 								</xsl:if>
2653: 							</xsl:for-each>
2654: 						</xsl:attribute>
2655: 						<xsl:attribute name="type">
2656: 							<xsl:for-each
2657: 								select="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextDesc">
2658: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2659: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2660: 								</xsl:if>
2661: 							</xsl:for-each>
2662: 						</xsl:attribute>
2663: 						<xsl:for-each
2664: 							select="$p_aribaComment[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
2665: 							<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine">
2666: 								<xsl:choose>
2667: 									<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
2668: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', TextLine)"/>
2669: 									</xsl:when>
2670: 									<xsl:otherwise>
2671: 										<xsl:if test="TextFormat = '* ' or '/ '">
2672: 											<xsl:choose>
2673: 												<xsl:when test="exists(TextLine)">
2674: 													<xsl:value-of
2675: 														select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TextLine))"
2676: 													/>
2677: 												</xsl:when>
2678: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2679: 													<xsl:text>&#10;</xsl:text>
2680: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2681: 											</xsl:choose>
2682: 										</xsl:if>
2683: 									</xsl:otherwise>
2684: 								</xsl:choose>
2685: 							</xsl:for-each>
2686: 						</xsl:for-each>
2687: 					</xsl:if>
2688: 				</xsl:when>
2689: 				<!-- For SSR,SES,PR-->
2690: 				<xsl:otherwise>
2691: 					<xsl:if
2692: 						test="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber)] and $p_itemNumber = '' and $v_textID != ''">
2693: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
2694: 							<xsl:for-each
2695: 								select="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
2696: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2697: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2698: 								</xsl:if>
2699: 							</xsl:for-each>
2700: 						</xsl:attribute>
2701: 						<xsl:for-each
2702: 							select="$p_aribaComment/Item[not(ItemNumber) and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
2703: 							<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
2704: 								<xsl:value-of select="concat(TextDesc, ':', '&#xA;')"/>
2705: 							</xsl:variable>
2706: 							<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine">
2707: 								<xsl:choose>
2708: 									<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
2709: 										<xsl:choose>
2710: 											<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 1">
2711: 												<xsl:text>&#xa;</xsl:text>
2712: 												<xsl:value-of
2713: 													select="concat(' ', $v_desc, TextLine)"/>
2714: 											</xsl:when>
2715: 											<xsl:otherwise>
2716: 												<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', TextLine)"/>
2717: 											</xsl:otherwise>
2718: 										</xsl:choose>
2719: 									</xsl:when>
2720: 									<xsl:otherwise>
2721: 										<xsl:if test="TextFormat = '* ' or '/ '">
2722: 											<xsl:choose>
2723: 												<xsl:when test="exists(TextLine)">
2724: 													<xsl:value-of
2725: 														select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TextLine))"
2726: 													/>
2727: 												</xsl:when>
2728: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2729: 													<xsl:text>&#10;</xsl:text>
2730: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2731: 											</xsl:choose>
2732: 										</xsl:if>
2733: 									</xsl:otherwise>
2734: 								</xsl:choose>
2735: 							</xsl:for-each>
2736: 						</xsl:for-each>
2737: 					</xsl:if>
2738: 				</xsl:otherwise>
2739: 			</xsl:choose>
2740: 			<!--  Filter the LineTextID from PD values  -->
2741: 			<!-- For DispatchDeliveryNotification-->
2742: 			<xsl:choose>
2743: 				<xsl:when test="$p_trans = 'DDN'">
2744: 					<xsl:if
2745: 						test="$p_aribaComment[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber] and $p_itemNumber = ItemNumber and $v_textID != ''">
2746: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
2747: 							<xsl:for-each
2748: 								select="$p_aribaComment[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
2749: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2750: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2751: 								</xsl:if>
2752: 							</xsl:for-each>
2753: 						</xsl:attribute>
2754: 						<xsl:attribute name="type">
2755: 							<xsl:for-each
2756: 								select="$p_aribaComment[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextDesc">
2757: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2758: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2759: 								</xsl:if>
2760: 							</xsl:for-each>
2761: 						</xsl:attribute>
2762: 						<xsl:for-each
2763: 							select="$p_aribaComment[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
2764: 							<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine">
2765: 								<xsl:choose>
2766: 									<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
2767: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', TextLine)"/>
2768: 									</xsl:when>
2769: 									<xsl:otherwise>
2770: 										<xsl:if test="TextFormat = '* ' or '/ '">
2771: 											<xsl:choose>
2772: 												<xsl:when test="exists(TextLine)">
2773: 													<xsl:value-of
2774: 														select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TextLine))"
2775: 													/>
2776: 												</xsl:when>
2777: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2778: 													<xsl:text>&#10;</xsl:text>
2779: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2780: 											</xsl:choose>
2781: 										</xsl:if>
2782: 									</xsl:otherwise>
2783: 								</xsl:choose>
2784: 							</xsl:for-each>
2785: 						</xsl:for-each>
2786: 					</xsl:if>
2787: 				</xsl:when>
2788: 				<!-- For SSR,SES,PR-->
2789: 				<xsl:otherwise>
2790: 					<xsl:if
2791: 						test="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber] and $p_itemNumber != '' and $v_textID != ''">
2792: 						<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
2793: 							<xsl:for-each
2794: 								select="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]/TextLang">
2795: 								<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
2796: 									<xsl:value-of select="."/>
2797: 								</xsl:if>
2798: 							</xsl:for-each>
2799: 						</xsl:attribute>
2800: 						<xsl:for-each
2801: 							select="$p_aribaComment/Item[ItemNumber = $p_itemNumber and contains($v_textID, normalize-space(TextID))]">
2802: 							<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
2803: 								<xsl:choose>
2804: 									<xsl:when test="exists(TextDesc)">
2805: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat(TextDesc, ':', '&#xA;')"/>
2806: 									</xsl:when>
2807: 									<xsl:otherwise>
2808: 										<xsl:value-of select="concat('Long Text', ':', '&#xA;')"/>
2809: 									</xsl:otherwise>
2810: 								</xsl:choose>
2811: 							</xsl:variable>
2812: 							<xsl:for-each select="AribaLine">
2813: 								<xsl:choose>
2814: 									<xsl:when test="position() = 1">
2815: 										<xsl:choose>
2816: 											<xsl:when test="string-length($v_desc) > 1">
2817: 												<xsl:text>&#xa;</xsl:text>
2818: 												<xsl:value-of
2819: 													select="concat(' ', $v_desc, TextLine)"/>
2820: 											</xsl:when>
2821: 											<xsl:otherwise>
2822: 												<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', TextLine)"/>
2823: 											</xsl:otherwise>
2824: 										</xsl:choose>
2825: 									</xsl:when>
2826: 									<xsl:otherwise>
2827: 										<xsl:if test="TextFormat = '* ' or '/ '">
2828: 											<xsl:choose>
2829: 												<xsl:when test="exists(TextLine)">
2830: 													<xsl:value-of
2831: 														select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TextLine))"
2832: 													/>
2833: 												</xsl:when>
2834: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2835: 													<xsl:text>&#10;</xsl:text>
2836: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2837: 											</xsl:choose>
2838: 										</xsl:if>
2839: 									</xsl:otherwise>
2840: 								</xsl:choose>
2841: 							</xsl:for-each>
2842: 						</xsl:for-each>
2843: 					</xsl:if>
2844: 				</xsl:otherwise>
2845: 			</xsl:choose>
2846: 		</xsl:if>
2847: 	</xsl:template>
2848: 	
2849: 	<xsl:template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
2850: 		<!-- MapMultiple Text Comments To cXML Split  -->
2851: 		<!-- Takes all the comments and attachment from the IDOC and reads the text IDS from the -->
2852: 		<!-- cross reference parameter to create <Comments>  segments in the cXML as there are   -->
2853: 		<!-- comments in E1EDKT1/E1EDPT1/E1EDCT1 and text IDS from the cross reference parameters-->
2854: 		<!-- Attachments will only be created to the first <Comment> segment  -->
2855: 		<!-- input  remaining-string	         : All the TextIDs from cross reference parameters
2856: 			        pattern                      : comma(,) since the cross reference parameters are separated by , 
2857: 			        comments                     : comments segment from the IDOC E1EDKT1/E1EDPT1/E1EDCT1
2858: 			        attachment                   : attachments from the IDOC under <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET>			        
2859: 			        onlyattachnocomments         : indicator that shows that only attachments are present in IDOC
2860: 			        itemNumber                   : PO line number
2861: 			        commentlevel                 : Comments at line or header level indicator
2862: 			        transaction                  : Orders or ScedulingAgreement transaction indicator
2863: 			        multicommentattachment_level : Indiator to have attachments only at first <Comments> segment
2864:              output              	             : cXML message with <Comments><Attachments> 	-->
2865: 		<xsl:param name="remaining-string"/>
2866: 		<xsl:param name="pattern"/>
2867: 		<xsl:param name="comments"/>
2868: 		<xsl:param name="attachment"/>
2869: 		<xsl:param name="onlyattachnocomments"/>
2870: 		<xsl:param name="itemNumber"/>
2871: 		<xsl:param name="commentlevel"/>
2872: 		<xsl:param name="transaction"/>
2873: 		<xsl:param name="multicommentattachment_level"/>
2874: 		<!-- Get the position of the <Comments>  -->
2875: 		<xsl:variable name="v_commentlevel">			
2876: 			<xsl:choose>
2877: 				<xsl:when test="string-length($transaction) = 0 and $comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))]">
2878: 					<xsl:value-of select="1"/>
2879: 				</xsl:when>
2880: 				<xsl:when test="string-length($transaction) > 0 and $commentlevel= 'HEADER' and $comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']">
2881: 					<xsl:value-of select="1"/>
2882: 				</xsl:when>
2883: 				<xsl:when test="string-length($transaction) > 0 and $commentlevel= 'LINE' and $comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $itemNumber]">
2884: 					<xsl:value-of select="1"/>
2885: 				</xsl:when>
2886: 			</xsl:choose>
2887: 		</xsl:variable>
2888: 		<!-- Check for PO or SA/SAR transaction   -->
2889: 		<xsl:if test="$transaction">
2890: 			<!-- SA/SAR transaction  -->
2891: 			<xsl:choose>
2892: 				<xsl:when test="contains($remaining-string, $pattern)">
2893: 					<xsl:variable name="v_comments_exists_sa_sar">
2894: 						<xsl:choose>
2895: 							<xsl:when test="$commentlevel= 'HEADER'">
2896: 								<xsl:value-of select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']"/>
2897: 							</xsl:when>
2898: 							<xsl:when test="$commentlevel= 'LINE'">
2899: 								<xsl:value-of
2900: 									select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $itemNumber]"
2901: 								/>
2902: 							</xsl:when>
2903: 						</xsl:choose>
2904: 					</xsl:variable>
2905: 					<xsl:if
2906: 						test="string-length($v_comments_exists_sa_sar) > 0">
2907: 						<Comments>							
2908: 							<xsl:attribute name="type">
2909: 								<xsl:choose>
2910: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
2911: 										<xsl:value-of
2912: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']/TDDESC"
2913: 										/>
2914: 									</xsl:when>
2915: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
2916: 										<xsl:value-of
2917: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $itemNumber]/TDDESC"
2918: 										/>
2919: 									</xsl:when>
2920: 								</xsl:choose>
2921: 							</xsl:attribute>
2922: 							<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
2923: 								<xsl:choose>
2924: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
2925: 										<xsl:value-of
2926: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']/TSSPRAS_ISO"
2927: 										/>
2928: 									</xsl:when>
2929: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
2930: 										<xsl:value-of
2931: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $itemNumber]/TSSPRAS_ISO"
2932: 										/>
2933: 									</xsl:when>
2934: 								</xsl:choose>
2935: 							</xsl:attribute>
2936: 							<!-- Get all the comments  -->
2937: 							<xsl:variable name="v_Comments">
2938: 								<xsl:choose>
2939: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
2940: 										<xsl:for-each
2941: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']">
2942: 											<xsl:for-each select="E1ARBCIG_LINES">
2943: 												<xsl:choose>					
2944: 													<!-- New Line  -->
2945: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*'">
2946: 												<xsl:value-of
2947: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
2948: 												/>
2949: 												</xsl:when>
2950: 													<!-- Same Line  -->
2951: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
2952: 												<!--IG-27121 - Fixed Blank Space Issue	-->
2953: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
2954: 												</xsl:when>
2955: 													<!-- New Line  -->
2956: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
2957: 												<xsl:value-of
2958: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
2959: 												/>
2960: 												</xsl:when>
2961: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2962: 												<xsl:value-of
2963: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
2964: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2965: 												</xsl:choose>
2966: 											</xsl:for-each>
2967: 										</xsl:for-each>
2968: 									</xsl:when>
2969: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
2970: 										<xsl:for-each
2971: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space(substring-before($remaining-string, $pattern))][TDOBJECT = 'EKPO'][ITEMNUMBER = $itemNumber]">
2972: 											<xsl:for-each select="E1ARBCIG_LINES">
2973: 												<xsl:choose>
2974: 													<!-- New Line  -->
2975: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*'">
2976: 												<xsl:value-of
2977: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
2978: 												/>
2979: 												</xsl:when>
2980: 													<!-- Same Line  -->
2981: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
2982: 												<!--IG-27121 - Fixed Blank Space Issue	-->
2983: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
2984: 												</xsl:when>
2985: 													<!-- New Line  -->
2986: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
2987: 												<xsl:value-of
2988: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
2989: 												/>
2990: 												</xsl:when>
2991: 												<xsl:otherwise>
2992: 												<xsl:value-of
2993: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
2994: 												</xsl:otherwise>
2995: 												</xsl:choose>
2996: 											</xsl:for-each>
2997: 										</xsl:for-each>
2998: 									</xsl:when>
2999: 								</xsl:choose>
3000: 							</xsl:variable>							
3001: 							<xsl:value-of select="$v_Comments"/>
3002: 							
3003: 							<xsl:if test="$multicommentattachment_level = 1">
3004: 								<!-- Check if for first <Comments> segment , the add attachments for header  -->
3005: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
3006: 									<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
3007: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3008: 									</xsl:call-template>
3009: 								</xsl:if>
3010: 								<!-- Check if for first <Comments> segment , the add attachments for Line  -->
3011: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
3012: 									<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
3013: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3014: 										<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$itemNumber"/>
3015: 									</xsl:call-template>
3016: 								</xsl:if>
3017: 							</xsl:if>
3018: 						</Comments>
3019: 					</xsl:if>
3020: 					<!-- Set indicator for checking the position of the <Comments> segment  -->
3021: 					<xsl:variable name="v_attachment_at_first_level_only">
3022: 						<xsl:choose>
3023: 							<xsl:when test="string-length($v_commentlevel) > 0">
3024: 								<xsl:value-of
3025: 									select="$v_commentlevel + $multicommentattachment_level"/>
3026: 							</xsl:when>
3027: 							<xsl:otherwise>
3028: 								<xsl:value-of select="0 + $multicommentattachment_level"/>
3029: 							</xsl:otherwise>
3030: 						</xsl:choose>
3031: 					</xsl:variable>
3032: 					<!-- Make recursive call if there are multiple text ids  -->
3033: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
3034: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string"
3035: 							select="substring-after($remaining-string, $pattern)"/>
3036: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="$pattern"/>
3037: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$comments"/>
3038: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$attachment"/>
3039: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel"/>
3040: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$itemNumber"/>
3041: 						<xsl:with-param name="transaction" select="'SchedulingAgreement'"/>
3042: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="$v_attachment_at_first_level_only"/>
3043: 					</xsl:call-template>
3044: 
3045: 				</xsl:when>
3046: 				<xsl:otherwise>
3047: 					<!-- IG-40370, For last iteration where no more text IDs available, Check if comment exists for this text IDs For particualr Item/Header-->					
3048: 					<xsl:variable name="v_comments_exists_sar">
3049: 						<xsl:choose>
3050: 							<xsl:when test="$commentlevel= 'HEADER'">
3051: 								<xsl:value-of select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)][TDOBJECT = 'EKKO']"/>
3052: 							</xsl:when>
3053: 							<xsl:when test="$commentlevel= 'LINE'">
3054: 								<xsl:value-of

3056: 								/>
3057: 							</xsl:when>
3058: 						</xsl:choose>
3059: 					</xsl:variable>	
3060: 					<!-- Instead of checking text ID in all the comments, we will check comment for particular line/header -->
3061: 					<xsl:if test="string-length($v_comments_exists_sar) > 0">

3063: 							<xsl:attribute name="type">

3093: 									<xsl:if

3097: 											<xsl:for-each select="E1ARBCIG_LINES">

3104: 												</xsl:when>

3107: 													<!--IG-41412 : Pass only TDLINE instead of whole context-->

3235: 									<xsl:variable name="v_desc">									
3236: 									</xsl:variable>

3249: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3250: 												/>
3251: 												</xsl:when>

3256: 												/>
3257: 											   </xsl:when>

3296: 												/>
3297: 											   </xsl:when>

3302: 												</xsl:when>
3303: 												<!-- New Line -->
3304: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
3305: 												<xsl:value-of

3307: 												/>
3308: 												</xsl:when>
3309: 												<xsl:otherwise>
3310: 												<xsl:value-of
3311: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3312: 												</xsl:otherwise>
3313: 											</xsl:choose>
3314: 										</xsl:for-each>
3315: 									</xsl:if>
3316: 									<!--Line level Comments-->
3317: 									<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_service_line">
3318: 										<!--Service Line level Comments-->
3319: 										<xsl:for-each select="E1EDCT2">
3320: 											<xsl:choose>
3321: 												<!-- Same Line -->
3322: 											    <xsl:when test=" TDLINE and not(exists(TDFORMAT))">
3323: 												<xsl:value-of
3324: 												select="concat (' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3325: 											    </xsl:when>
3326: 												<!-- New Line -->
3327: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and exists(TDLINE)">
3328: 												<xsl:value-of
3329: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3330: 												</xsl:when>
3331: 												<!-- Blank Line -->
3332: 												<xsl:when
3333: 												test="TDFORMAT = '*' and not(exists(TDLINE))">
3334: 												<xsl:value-of
3335: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3336: 												/>
3337: 												</xsl:when>
3338: 												<!-- Same Line -->
3339: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
3340: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
3341: 												</xsl:when>
3342: 												<!-- New Line  -->
3343: 												<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
3344: 												<xsl:value-of
3345: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3346: 												/>
3347: 												</xsl:when>
3348: 												<xsl:otherwise>
3349: 												<xsl:value-of
3350: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3351: 												</xsl:otherwise>
3352: 											</xsl:choose>
3353: 										</xsl:for-each>
3354: 									</xsl:if>
3355: 									<!--Service Line level Comments-->
3356: 								</xsl:for-each>
3357: 							</xsl:variable>
3358: 							<xsl:value-of select="$v_Comments"/>
3359: 							<xsl:if test="$multicommentattachment_level = 1">
3360: 								<!-- Check if for first <Comments> segment , the add attachments for Header  -->
3361: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
3362: 									<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
3363: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3364: 									</xsl:call-template>
3365: 								</xsl:if>
3366: 								<!-- Check if for first <Comments> segment , the add attachments for Line  -->
3367: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
3368: 									<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
3369: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3370: 										<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$itemNumber"/>
3371: 									</xsl:call-template>
3372: 								</xsl:if>
3373: 							</xsl:if>
3374: 						</Comments>
3375: 					</xsl:if>
3376: 					<!-- Set indicator for checking the position of the <Comments> segment  -->				
3377: 					<xsl:variable name="v_attachment_at_first_level_only">
3378: 						<xsl:choose>
3379: 							<xsl:when test="string-length($v_commentlevel) > 0">
3380: 								<xsl:value-of
3381: 									select="$v_commentlevel + $multicommentattachment_level"/>
3382: 							</xsl:when>
3383: 							<xsl:otherwise>
3384: 								<xsl:value-of select="0 + $multicommentattachment_level"/>
3385: 							</xsl:otherwise>
3386: 						</xsl:choose>
3387: 					</xsl:variable>
3388: 					<!-- Make recursive call if there are multiple text ids  -->
3389: 					<xsl:call-template name="MapMultiple_Text_Comments_To_cXML_Split">
3390: 						<xsl:with-param name="remaining-string"
3391: 							select="substring-after($remaining-string, $pattern)"/>
3392: 						<xsl:with-param name="pattern" select="$pattern"/>
3393: 						<xsl:with-param name="comments" select="$comments"/>
3394: 						<xsl:with-param name="attachment" select="$attachment"/>
3395: 						<xsl:with-param name="commentlevel" select="$commentlevel"/>
3396: 						<xsl:with-param name="itemNumber" select="$itemNumber"/>
3397: 						<xsl:with-param name="multicommentattachment_level" select="$v_attachment_at_first_level_only"/>
3398: 					</xsl:call-template>
3399: 				</xsl:when>
3400: 				<xsl:otherwise>
3401: 					<xsl:if test="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]">
3402: 						<Comments>
3403: 							<xsl:attribute name="type">
3404: 								<xsl:choose>
3405: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
3406: 										<xsl:value-of
3407: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]/E1ARBCIG_DESC/TDDESC"
3408: 										/>
3409: 									</xsl:when>
3410: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
3411: 										<xsl:value-of
3412: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]/E1ARBCIG_DESC_ITEM/TDDESC"
3413: 										/>
3414: 									</xsl:when>
3415: 									<xsl:when test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_service_line">
3416: 										<xsl:value-of
3417: 											select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]/E1ARBCIG_DESC_SITEM/TDDESC"
3418: 										/>
3419: 									</xsl:when>
3420: 								</xsl:choose>
3421: 							</xsl:attribute>
3422: 							<xsl:attribute name="xml:lang">
3423: 								<xsl:value-of
3424: 									select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]/TSSPRAS_ISO"
3425: 								/>
3426: 							</xsl:attribute>
3427: 							<xsl:for-each
3428: 								select="$comments[TDID = normalize-space($remaining-string)]">
3429: 								<xsl:variable name="v_desc">
3430: 									<!--<xsl:if test="string-length(E1ARBCIG_DESC/TDDESC) > 0">
3431: 									<xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', E1ARBCIG_DESC/TDDESC, ':')"/>
3432: 								</xsl:if>-->
3433: 								</xsl:variable>
3434: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">
3435: 									<!--Header level Comments-->
3436: 									<xsl:for-each select="E1EDKT2">
3437: 										<xsl:choose>
3438: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3439: 										   <xsl:when test=" TDLINE and not(exists(TDFORMAT))">
3440: 												<xsl:value-of
3441: 												select="concat (' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3442: 											</xsl:when>
3443: 											<!-- New Line  -->
3444: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and exists(TDLINE)">
3445: 												<xsl:value-of
3446: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3447: 											</xsl:when>
3448: 											<!-- Blank Line  -->
3449: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and not(exists(TDLINE))">
3450: 												<xsl:value-of
3451: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3452: 												/>
3453: 											</xsl:when>
3454: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3455: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
3456: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
3457: 											</xsl:when>
3458: 											<!-- New Line  -->
3459: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
3460: 												<xsl:value-of
3461: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3462: 												/>
3463: 											</xsl:when>
3464: 											<xsl:otherwise>
3465: 												<xsl:value-of
3466: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3467: 											</xsl:otherwise>
3468: 										</xsl:choose>
3469: 									</xsl:for-each>
3470: 								</xsl:if>
3471: 								<!--Header level Comments-->
3472: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
3473: 									<!--Line level Comments-->
3474: 									<xsl:for-each select="E1EDPT2">
3475: 										<xsl:choose>
3476: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3477: 											<xsl:when test=" TDLINE and not(exists(TDFORMAT))">
3478: 												<xsl:value-of
3479: 												select="concat (' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3480: 											</xsl:when>
3481: 											<!-- New Line  -->
3482: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and exists(TDLINE)">
3483: 												<xsl:value-of
3484: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3485: 											</xsl:when>
3486: 											<!-- Blank Line  -->
3487: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and not(exists(TDLINE))">
3488: 												<xsl:value-of
3489: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3490: 												/>
3491: 											</xsl:when>
3492: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3493: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
3494: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
3495: 											</xsl:when>
3496: 											<!-- New Line  -->
3497: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
3498: 												<xsl:value-of
3499: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3500: 												/>
3501: 											</xsl:when>
3502: 											<xsl:otherwise>
3503: 												<xsl:value-of
3504: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3505: 											</xsl:otherwise>
3506: 										</xsl:choose>
3507: 									</xsl:for-each>
3508: 								</xsl:if>
3509: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_line">
3510: 									<!--Service Line level Comments-->
3511: 									<xsl:for-each select="E1EDCT2">
3512: 										<xsl:choose>
3513: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3514: 										   <xsl:when test=" TDLINE and not(exists(TDFORMAT))">
3515: 												<xsl:value-of
3516: 												select="concat (' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3517: 											</xsl:when>

3520: 												<xsl:value-of

3522: 											</xsl:when>
3523: 											<!-- Blank Line  -->
3524: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '*' and not(exists(TDLINE))">
3525: 												<xsl:value-of
3526: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3527: 												/>
3528: 											</xsl:when>
3529: 											<!-- Same Line  -->
3530: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '='">
3531: 												<xsl:value-of select="TDLINE"/>
3532: 											</xsl:when>
3533: 											<!-- New Line  -->
3534: 											<xsl:when test="TDFORMAT = '/'">
3535: 												<xsl:value-of
3536: 												select="concat('&#xA;', normalize-space(TDLINE))"
3537: 												/>
3538: 											</xsl:when>
3539: 											<xsl:otherwise>
3540: 												<xsl:value-of
3541: 												select="concat(' ', normalize-space(TDLINE))"/>
3542: 											</xsl:otherwise>
3543: 										</xsl:choose>
3544: 									</xsl:for-each>
3545: 								</xsl:if>

3547: 							</xsl:for-each>
3548: 							<xsl:if test="$multicommentattachment_level = 1">
3549: 								<xsl:if test="$commentlevel = $commentlevel_header">

3551: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3552: 									</xsl:call-template>
3553: 								</xsl:if>
3554:

3556: 									<xsl:call-template name="addContenIdIDOC">
3557: 										<xsl:with-param name="eachAtt" select="$attachment"/>
3558: 										<xsl:with-param name="lineNumber" select="$itemNumber"/>
3559: 									</xsl:call-template>
3560: 								</xsl:if>
3561: 							</xsl:if>
3562: 						</Comments>
3563: 					</xsl:if>					
3564: 				</xsl:otherwise>
3565: 			</xsl:choose>
3566: 		</xsl:if>
3567: 	</xsl:template> 
3568: 	<!--    Get the Default Language -->
3569: 	<xsl:template name="SendManufacturerName">
3570: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
3571: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
3572: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
3573: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
3574: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
3575: 			<!-- Read Default Language from PD -->
3576: 			<xsl:value-of
3577: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/SendManufacturerName)"
3578: 			/>
3579: 		</xsl:if>
3580: 	</xsl:template>
3581: 	<!--IG-23905 Send Payment Terms -->
3582: 	<xsl:template name="SendPaymentTerms">
3583: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
3584: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
3585: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
3586: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
3587: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
3588: 			<!-- Read Default Language from PD -->
3589: 			<xsl:value-of
3590: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/SendPaymentTerms)"
3591: 			/>
3592: 		</xsl:if>
3593: 	</xsl:template>
3594: 	<!--    IG-26224 Template for SpecialHandlingAmount --> 
3595: 	<!--    Get the SpecialHandlingAmount flag -->
3596: 	<xsl:template name="SpecialHandlingAmount">
3597: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
3598: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>		
3599: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
3600: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
3601: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
3602: 			<!-- Read SpecialHandlingAmount from PD -->
3603: 			<xsl:value-of
3604: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/SpecialHandlingAmount)"
3605: 			/>								
3606: 		</xsl:if>
3607: 	</xsl:template>	
3608: 	<!-- Begin of IG-17864 for getting line level attachments & multiple attachments at both header and line item level -->	
3609: 	<!-- for Inbound multiple attachments -->
3610: 	<xsl:template name="InboundMultiAttProxy_Common">
3611: 		<!-- Map multiple attachments from cXML to Proxy Structure -->
3612: 		<!-- Takes all the attachments from the cXML and map it to the <Attachment> segments -->
3613: 		<!-- in the Proxy Structure. The header attachment will be mapped first then the     -->
3614: 		<!-- attachments at the lines.                                                       -->
3615: 		<!-- Header attachments details with no line numbers will be in the variable "headerAtt" -->
3616: 		<!-- Line attachments details with line numbers will be in the variable "lineReference" -->
3617: 		<!-- input   headerAtt         : All attachments at header level
3618: 			         lineReference     : All attachments at line level along with line numbers			      		             
3619:              output         	       : Attachments segments <E1ARBCIG_ATTACH_HDR_DET> in the IDOC 
3620: 		___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
3621: 		     template used by          : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_OrderRequest_AddOn_0000_SalesOrderRequest.xsl
3622: 		                               : MAPPING_ANY_cXML_0000_ShipNoticeRequest_AddOn_0000_AdvanceShipmentNotice.xsl -->		
3623: 		<xsl:param name="headerAtt"/>
3624: 		<xsl:param name="lineReference"/>
3625: 		<xsl:variable name="attList" select="AttachmentList"/>
3626: 		<Attachment>
3627: 			<xsl:for-each select="$headerAtt">
3628: 				
3629: 				<xsl:if test="contains(., 'cid:')">
3630: 					<xsl:variable name="cid" select="substring-after(., 'cid:')"/>
3631: 					<xsl:variable name="selectedAtt"
3632: 						select="$attList/Attachment[AttachmentID = $cid]"/>
3633: 					<Item>
3634: 						<FileName>
3635: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentName"/>
3636: 						</FileName>
3637: 						<ContentType>
3638: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentType"/>
3639: 						</ContentType>
3640: 						<ContentId>
3641: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentID"/>
3642: 						</ContentId>
3643: 						<Content>
3644: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentContent"/>
3645: 						</Content>
3646: 					</Item>
3647: 				</xsl:if>
3648: 			</xsl:for-each>
3649: 			<xsl:for-each select="$lineReference">
3650: 				<xsl:variable name="index" select="position()"/>
3651: 				<xsl:if test="contains(., 'cid:')">
3652: 					<xsl:variable name="cid" select="substring-after(., 'cid:')"/>
3653: 					<xsl:variable name="selectedAtt"
3654: 						select="$attList/Attachment[AttachmentID = $cid]"/>
3655: 					<Item>
3656: 						<FileName>
3657: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentName"/>
3658: 						</FileName>
3659: 						<ContentType>
3660: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentType"/>
3661: 						</ContentType>
3662: 						<ContentId>
3663: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentID"/>
3664: 						</ContentId>
3665: 						<Content>
3666: 							<xsl:value-of select="$selectedAtt/AttachmentContent"/>
3667: 						</Content>
3668: 						<LineNumber>
3669: 							<xsl:call-template name="getLineNo_Common">
3670: 								<xsl:with-param name="array" select="$lineReference"/>
3671: 								<xsl:with-param name="index" select="$index"/>
3672: 							</xsl:call-template>
3673: 						</LineNumber>
3674: 					</Item>
3675: 				</xsl:if>
3676: 			</xsl:for-each>
3677: 		</Attachment>
3678: 	</xsl:template>
3679: 	<!-- END of IG-17864 -->
3680: 	<!--	Begin of IG-30341 -->
3681: 	<!--	Supplier part id will be populated from CIG -->
3682: 	<!--	Blank will be populated if nothing is maintained-->
3683: 	<xsl:template name="defaultSupplierPartID">
3684: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
3685: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
3686: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
3687: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
3688: 			<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
3689: 			<!-- Read Default SupplierPartID from PD -->
3690: 			<xsl:value-of
3691: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/defaultSupplierPartID)"
3692: 			/>
3693: 		</xsl:if>
3694: 	</xsl:template>
3695: 	<!--	End of IG-30341   -->	
3696: 	<!-- START of IG-33868 -->
3697: 	<!-- Get Negative Quantity Flag  -->
3698: 	<xsl:template name="NegativeQuantity">
3699: 		<xsl:param name="p_doctype"/>
3700: 		<xsl:param name="p_pd"/>
3701: 		<xsl:if test="$anCrossRefFlag = 'YES'">
3702: 			<!--calling the binary PD to get the CROSS REF -->
3703: 						<xsl:variable name="crossrefparamLookup" select="document($p_pd)"/>
3704: 			<xsl:value-of
3705: 				select="upper-case($crossrefparamLookup/ParameterCrossReference/ListOfItems/Item[DocumentType = $p_doctype]/NegativeQuantity)"
3706: 			/>
3707: 		</xsl:if>
3708: 	</xsl:template>
3709: 	<!-- END of IG-33868 -->
3710: </xsl:stylesheet>
3711:
